Subspecies.OriginalPublicationName: Systema Naturæ per Regna Tria Naturæ, Secundum Classes, Ordines, Genera, Species, cum Characteribus, Differentiis, Synonymis, Locis. Tomus I. Editio decima, reformata
Subspecies.Distribution: Winter: Entire coastline of the peninsula apart from Lakshadweep, Andaman & Nicobar Is. Inland during passage.

Genus.Name: Calidris
Genus.Author: Merrem
Genus.OriginalPublicationName: Allgemeine Literatur-Zeitung

Species.Author: Horsfield
Species.OriginalPublicationName: Transactions of the Linnean Society of London
Species.Distribution: Winter: W coast from Gujarat till Kerala and E coast from Sundarbans till Hare Is., Tirunelveli (Tamil Nadu) as well as N and S Andaman Is.
Species.Specimens: BNHS

Subspecies.Author: Linnaeus
Subspecies.OriginalPublicationName: Systema Naturæ per Regna Tria Naturæ, Secundum Classes, Ordines, Genera, Species, cum Characteribus, Differentiis, Synonymis, Locis. Tomus I. Editio decima, reformata
Subspecies.Taxonomy: Formerly, only this subspecies was recognised from India.
Subspecies.Distribution: Winter: Jamnagar (W Gujarat); sporadically in Goa and Kerala.
Subspecies.Notes: Birds found in Gujarat are most likely on their passage to Africa. Goa & Kerala birds tentatively parked under this subspecies.

Subspecies.Author: Tomkovich
Subspecies.OriginalPublicationName: Bulletin of the British Ornithologists' Club
Subspecies.Distribution: E coast.
Subspecies.Notes: Recently described subspecies and its migration path towards NW Australia likely to fall along the E coast of India.

Subspecies.Author: Mathews
Subspecies.OriginalPublicationName: The birds of Australia
Subspecies.Distribution: Winter: SE coast, as well as sporadically elsewhere in E coast (Pulicat, Kakinada, Nalabana, Chandipur, and Sundarbans) as well as Tinsukia (E Assam).
Subspecies.Notes: After Balachandran (1998), all birds in the E coast considered this taxon.

Species.Author: Linnaeus
Species.OriginalPublicationName: Systema Naturæ per Regna Tria Naturæ, Secundum Classes, Ordines, Genera, Species, cum Characteribus, Differentiis, Synonymis, Locis. Tomus I. Editio decima, reformata
Species.Distribution: Winter: Most widespread in the states of N and NW India and W Bengal. Also, in Indo-Gangetic plains, C India, Deccan, the coastal plains, Assam plains, and Andaman Is.
Species.Specimens: BNHS, ZSI, UMMZ, AMNH, FMNH, MCZ, YPM, TNHM, LKO

Subspecies.Author: Pontoppidan
Subspecies.OriginalPublicationName: Den Danske Atlas eller Konge-Riget Dannemark (etc.)
Subspecies.Distribution: Winter: W coast from Gujarat south till S Kerala. Reported rarely inland during migration.

Subspecies.Author: Dresser
Subspecies.OriginalPublicationName: Proceedings of the Zoological Society of London
Subspecies.Distribution: Winter: E coast from W Bengal, Odisha, and Tamil Nadu as well as Andaman Is.
Subspecies.Notes: Considered hypothetical by RA2012 but included here based on ZSI specimen from Sagar Is., West Bengal (#32584) as well as a ringed bird from Point Calimere that was recovered in Shanghai (Balachandran _et al._ 2018). Hence, all of E coast as well as Andaman Is. birds considered this subspecies. UMZC#16/Sco/16/a/3 is listed as a Syntype from India though the subspecies is indistinguishable in winter plumage.

Species.Author: Horsfield
Species.OriginalPublicationName: Transactions of the Linnean Society of London
Species.Distribution: Vagrant. Gilgit, Hokersar (Kashmir), Startsapuk Tso (Ladakh), and Najafgarh (Delhi).

Species.Author: Pontoppidan
Species.OriginalPublicationName: Den Danske Atlas eller Konge-Riget Dannemark (etc.)
Species.Distribution: Winter: Entire coastline of India including Lakshadweep, Andaman & Nicobar Is but also inland in sites in Gujarat, E Rajasthan and Delhi region during migration.
Species.Specimens: BNHS, ZSI, ROM, USNM, YPM, TNHM

Species.Author: Leisler
Species.OriginalPublicationName: Nachträge zu Bechsteins Naturgeschichte Deutschlands
Species.Distribution: Winter: Throughout India including Lakshadweep and Andaman Is.
Species.Specimens: BNHS, ZSI, UMZC, UMMZ, AMNH, FMNH, ROM, USNM, YPM, HYD, LKO

Species.Author: Middendorff
Species.OriginalPublicationName: Reise in den äuβersten Norden und Osten Sibiriens während der Jahre 1843 und 1844 mit allerhöchster Genehmigung auf Veranstaltung der Kaiserlichen Akademie der Wissenschaften zu St. Petersburg ausgeführt
Species.Distribution: Winter: Coastal regions of Gujarat, NW Maharashtra, Goa, Kerala, Tamil Nadu, NE Andhra, Chilika, W Bengal, and Andaman Is.
Species.Specimens: BNHS, ZSI, AMNH, ROM

Species.Author: Pallas
Species.OriginalPublicationName: Reise durch verschiedene Provinzen des Russischen Reichs
Species.Distribution: Winter: Coasts of W Bengal, Odisha, and Tamil Nadu apart from Andaman Is.
Species.Specimens: BNHS, ZSI, ROM

Species.Author: Linnaeus
Species.OriginalPublicationName: Systema Naturæ per Regna Tria Naturæ, Secundum Classes, Ordines, Genera, Species, cum Characteribus, Differentiis, Synonymis, Locis. Tomus I. Editio decima, reformata
Species.Distribution: Straggler in the winter to E coast from Sundarbans region, Chilika, and Point Calimere.
Species.Specimens: BNHS, NML

Species.Author: Vieillot
Species.OriginalPublicationName: Nouveau dictionnaire d'histoire naturelle, appliquée aux arts, à l'agriculture, à l'économie rurale et domestique, à la médecine, etc. Nouvelle édition
Species.Distribution: Vagrant. Reported from Divar Is. (Goa) and Madayipara (Kerala).

Subspecies.Author: Pallas
Subspecies.OriginalPublicationName: Adumbratiunculæ. Avium variarum praecedenti elencho insertarum, sed quæ in Systemate Naturæ Illustr. Linnæi nondum extant
Subspecies.Distribution: Winter: Both W and E coast as well as Lakshadweep, S Andaman, and Car Nicobar Is. Rarely inland during passage.
Subspecies.Notes: Subspecies _rubida_ (Gmelin 1789) possibly breeds in NE Siberia (Engelmoer & Roselaar 1998) and hence cannot be ruled out in the E coast.

Subspecies.Author: Linnaeus
Subspecies.OriginalPublicationName: Systema Naturæ per Regna Tria Naturæ, Secundum Classes, Ordines, Genera, Species, cum Characteribus, Differentiis, Synonymis, Locis. Tomus I. Editio decima, reformata
Subspecies.Distribution: Winter: N and NW through Delhi region, Gangetic plains, Rajasthan, and Gujarat, and extending further along the W coastal plains till S Kerala and SE coast. Sporadically in C India and Deccan as well.

Subspecies.Author: Buturlin
Subspecies.OriginalPublicationName: Alauda: Études et Notes Ornithologiques
Subspecies.Taxonomy: Not always recognised (see Engelmoer & Roselaar 1998) and included under _sakhalina_.
Subspecies.Distribution: Winter: S W Bengal and Assam plains.
Subspecies.Notes: Tentatively all birds in E & NE India assigned to this subspecies after RA2012. UMMZ #76757-62 from Hissar, Haryana listed as this subspecies. All specimens need to be revisited.

Subspecies.Author: Vieillot
Subspecies.OriginalPublicationName: Nouveau dictionnaire d'histoire naturelle, appliquée aux arts, à l'agriculture, à l'économie rurale et domestique, à la médecine, etc. Nouvelle édition
Subspecies.Distribution: NE India.
Subspecies.Notes: Probably NE Indian birds belong to this subspecies (or a subspecies from the _sakhalina_ group).

Species.Author: Leisler
Species.OriginalPublicationName: Nachträge zu Bechsteins Naturgeschichte Deutschlands
Species.Distribution: Winter: Throughout India including Lakshadweep Is but except NE hills states.
Species.Specimens: BNHS, ZSI, UMZC, UMMZ, AMNH, FMNH, ROM, USNM, YPM, TNHM, LKO

Species.Author: Vieillot
Species.OriginalPublicationName: Nouveau dictionnaire d'histoire naturelle, appliquée aux arts, à l'agriculture, à l'économie rurale et domestique, à la médecine, etc. Nouvelle édition
Species.Distribution: Vagrant. Reported from Harike (Punjab), Madayipara, Kadamakudy and Vembanad (all three in Kerala), Pariej (Gujarat), Achankulam (near Coimbatore, Tamil Nadu), and Chouldari (S Andaman).

Genus.Name: Turnix
Genus.Author: Bonnaterre
Genus.OriginalPublicationName: Tableau encyclopédique et méthodique des trois règnes de la nature. Ornithologie. 2nd ed.
Genus.GenusDesignationPublicationName: , A list of the genera of birds, with an indication of the typical species of each genus

Subspecies.Author: Blyth
Subspecies.OriginalPublicationName: Journal of the Asiatic Society of Bengal
Subspecies.Taxonomy: Subspecies _albiventris_ Le Messurier, 1904 of Nicobar Is. included here following Ri1982. However, investigation required as it is likely to be _blanfordii_ on range.
Subspecies.Distribution: Breeding: N subcontinent from Punjab in the north to Gujarat in the west and W Bengal in the east and south through C India till about C Maharashtra and Telangana. Winter: S India till S Kerala. Also, resident in Nicobar Is – Car Nicobar, C Nicobar Is. (Terera, Kamorta, and Trinket Is.) as well as Great Nicobar Is.
Subspecies.Specimens: BNHS, ZSI, NHMUK, UMMZ, FMNH, ROM, USNM, YPM, TNHM
Subspecies.Notes: Exact limits of breeding range and full scale of movements not yet worked out.

Subspecies.Author: Blyth
Subspecies.OriginalPublicationName: Journal of the Asiatic Society of Bengal
Subspecies.Distribution: Winter: Brahmaputra valley in Assam, Nagaland, Meghalaya, Cachar, and Andaman Is.
Subspecies.Notes: Manipur & Mizoram range not investigated. Andaman reports assumed to be this subspecies on range.

Species.Author: Gmelin
Species.OriginalPublicationName: Systema Naturae. Editio decima tertia, aucta, reformata. Cura Jo. Frid. Gmelin (etc.). Tomus I. Pars II

Subspecies.Author: Sykes
Subspecies.OriginalPublicationName: Proceedings of the Committee of Science and Correspondence of the Zoological Society of London
Subspecies.Distribution: Throughout the peninsula south of Punjab, through Delhi region, Rajasthan (excluding Thar), Gujarat, C India, and S India (except S Kerala).
Subspecies.Specimens: BNHS, ZSI, UMZC, UMMZ, AMNH, FMNH, ROM, YPM, TNHM, LKO

Subspecies.Author: Hodgson
Subspecies.OriginalPublicationName: The Bengal Sporting Magazine
Subspecies.Distribution: Along the base of the Himalaya from about Jammu east through Uttarakhand, N Uttar Pradesh, N Bihar, N Bengal, Sikkim, Brahmaputra plains of Assam, and adjoining Arunachal; Meghalaya, Manipur valley, Mizoram, and Tripura.
Subspecies.Specimens: BNHS, UMMZ, AMNH, FMNH, ROM, YPM, LKO
Subspecies.Notes: Probably Nagaland & Cachar as well.

Subspecies.Author: Blyth
Subspecies.OriginalPublicationName: Catalogue of the birds in the Museum Asiatic Society
Subspecies.Taxonomy: Poorly differentiated subspecies from _plumbipes_. Includes _isabellinus_ Robinson & Baker (1928) from Calcutta [=Kolkata].
Subspecies.Distribution: S W Bengal.
Subspecies.Notes: Probably adjoining Bihar, Jharkhand, and Odisha. BNHS #19292 (Kolkata) is probably what Abdulali (1968) listed in the catalogue. The other known specimen is YPM #010167 from Chandpara (W Bengal).

Species.Author: Desfontaines
Species.OriginalPublicationName: Histoire de l'Académie Royale des Sciences. Avec les Mémoires de Mathématique & de Physique

Subspecies.Author: Temminck
Subspecies.OriginalPublicationName: Nouveau recueil de planches coloriées d'oiseaux, pour servir de suite et de complément aux planches enluminées de Buffon
Subspecies.Distribution: Base of Himalaya from Uttarakhand and Punjab, through the NW India in Delhi region, E Rajasthan, and Gujarat; adjacent C India extending till Chhattisgarh and south to Maharashtra and Telangana. Disperses further after breeding but extension of non-breeding range is little known.
Subspecies.Specimens: BNHS, ZSI, UMZC, AMNH, FMNH, YPM, TNHM
Subspecies.Notes: Reports from NE India not evaluated as no specimens have been located (see RA2012).

Genus.Name: Dromas
Genus.Author: Paykull
Genus.OriginalPublicationName: Kongliga Svenska Vetenskaps-Akademiens Handlingar

Species.Author: Paykull
Species.OriginalPublicationName: Kongliga Svenska Vetenskaps-Akademiens Handlingar
Species.Distribution: Winter: Kachchh, W coast from Gujarat, south through Maharashtra, Goa, Karnataka and Kerala coasts as well as SE coast; also Lakshadweep, Andaman & Nicobar Is.
Species.Specimens: BNHS, NHMUK, ROM

Genus.Name: Rhinoptilus
Genus.Author: Strickland
Genus.OriginalPublicationName: Proceedings of the Zoological Society of London
Genus.GenusDesignationPublicationName: , Catalogue of the birds in the British Museum

Species.Author: Blyth
Species.OriginalPublicationName: Journal of the Asiatic Society of Bengal
Species.Distribution: Historically in SE Ghats of Andhra in Godavari and Pennar river valley, west till about Kolar (SE Karnataka) and north till about Sironcha in Gadchiroli (SW Maharashtra) but now known only from Sri Lankamalleswara sanctuary in SE Andhra.
Species.Specimens: BNHS, NHMUK, UMZC

Genus.Name: Cursorius
Genus.Author: Latham
Genus.OriginalPublicationName: Index ornithologicus, sive systema ornithologiæ; complectens avium divisionem in classes, ordines, genera, species, ipsarumque varietates: adjectis synonymis, locis, descriptionibus, &c.
Genus.GenusDesignationPublicationName: , Zoological Illustrations

Species.Author: Latham
Species.OriginalPublicationName: Supplement to the general synopsis of birds

Subspecies.Author: Zarudny
Subspecies.OriginalPublicationName: Bulletin de la Société Impériale des Naturalistes de Moscou
Subspecies.Taxonomy: AR2001 lists this under the nominate subspecies.
Subspecies.Distribution: Winter: NW India from S Kashmir, Haryana, W Rajasthan, and Kachchh. Stragglers further east in Rajasthan and Mumbai region.

Species.Author: Gmelin
Species.OriginalPublicationName: Systema Naturae. Editio decima tertia, aucta, reformata. Cura Jo. Frid. Gmelin (etc.). Tomus I. Pars II
Species.Distribution: Peninsular India south from about Delhi, through N, C, W and S India extending east till about Telangana, Chhattisgarh and extreme W parts of W Bengal.
Species.Specimens: BNHS, ZSI, UMZC, UMMZ, AMNH, FMNH, MCZ, USNM, YPM, TNHM, HYD

Genus.Name: Glareola
Genus.Author: Brisson
Genus.OriginalPublicationName: Ornithologia sive synopsis methodica sistens avium divisionem in ordines, sectiones, genera, species, ipsarumaque varietates

Species.Author: Temminck
Species.AlternativeNames: Little Pratincole, Small Indian Pratincole, Small Indian Swallow-plover
Species.OriginalPublicationName: Manuel d'ornithologie, ou tableau systématique des oiseaux qui se trouvent en Europe (etc.)
Species.Distribution: Throughout peninsular India south of the Himalaya extending into Assam plains and Manipur valley. Also, Andaman Is.
Species.Specimens: BNHS, UMZC, UMMZ, AMNH, FMNH, MCZ, ROM, YPM, TNHM, HYD

Species.Author: Forster
Species.AlternativeNames: Large Indian Swallow-plover, Large Indian Pratincole
Species.OriginalPublicationName: Faunula Indica, id est catalogus animalium Indiae Orientalis quae hactenus naturae curiosis innotuerunt. 2nd ed.
Species.Distribution: Throughout peninsular India south of the Himalaya and east of Thar desert; extending to Brahmaputra plains and Manipur valley; Lakshadweep, Andaman & Nicobar Is.
Species.Specimens: BNHS, ZSI, AMNH, FMNH, YPM, TNHM, LKO

Subspecies.Author: Linnaeus
Subspecies.OriginalPublicationName: Systema Naturæ. Editio duodecima reformata. Tomus I [part 1]
Subspecies.Distribution: Breeding: Gujarat. Non-breeding: Spreads thinly in peninsular India – locally in Chilika (Odisha) and SW coastal plains. Reports inland from N and C India, Deccan as well as Andamans likely to be birds in migration.
Subspecies.Notes: Migration details not worked out.

Genus.Name: Stercorarius
Genus.Author: Brisson
Genus.OriginalPublicationName: Ornithologia sive synopsis methodica sistens avium divisionem in ordines, sectiones, genera, species, ipsarumaque varietates

Species.Author: Vieillot
Species.Taxonomy: Sometimes treated as monotypic.

Subspecies.Author: Vieillot
Subspecies.OriginalPublicationName: Nouveau dictionnaire d'histoire naturelle, appliquée aux arts, à l'agriculture, à l'économie rurale et domestique, à la médecine, etc. Nouvelle édition
Subspecies.Taxonomy: In the absence of specimens, origins of the regional non-breeding population are uncertain. We tentatively assign them to the nominate subspecies as this is the most likely one (RA2012). However, _pallescens_ Løppenthin 1932), also breeds in NE Siberia and it can also occur in S Asia.
Subspecies.Distribution: Off-shore SW India as well as stragglers in Bay of Bengal.
Subspecies.Notes: Migration details not worked out but apparently more likely in spring (Karuthedathu 2019).

Species.Author: Linnaeus
Species.OriginalPublicationName: Systema Naturæ per Regna Tria Naturæ, Secundum Classes, Ordines, Genera, Species, cum Characteribus, Differentiis, Synonymis, Locis. Tomus I. Editio decima, reformata
Species.Distribution: Winter: Off-shore waters in the Arabian Sea and sporadically in Bay of Bengal. Sporadic elsewhere and sometimes inland during migration.
Species.Specimens: CMFRI

Species.Author: Temminck
Species.OriginalPublicationName: Manuel d'ornithologie, ou tableau systématique des oiseaux qui se trouvent en Europe (etc.)
Species.Distribution: Winter: Off-shore waters in the Arabian Sea, mostly south of Goa as well as off-shore Bay of Bengal on the Tamil Nadu coast.
Species.Specimens: BNHS, ZMA

Species.Author: Lesson
Species.OriginalPublicationName: Traité d'Ornithologie, ou Tableau Méthodique des ordres, sous-ordres, familles, tribus, genres, sous-genres et races d'oiseaux

Subspecies.Author: Mathews
Subspecies.OriginalPublicationName: Novitates Zoologicae
Subspecies.Taxonomy: Subspecies assessment tentative (RA2012).
Subspecies.Distribution: Vagrant. Reports in (northern) summer of shored birds from Sindhudurg (SW Maharashtra, historical), offshore SW Karnataka, twice from Thiruvananthapuram (one historical and one recent) apart from one from Alappuzha (Kerala) off-shore waters.

Species.Author: Saunders
Species.OriginalPublicationName: Bulletin of the British Ornithologists' Club
Species.Distribution: Vagrant. Definitive reports during (northern) summer from the coasts of Karnataka, Kerala and Tamil Nadu.
Species.Specimens: BNHS

Genus.Name: Hydrocoloeus
Genus.Author: Kaup
Genus.OriginalPublicationName: Skizzirte Entwickelungs-Geschichte und natürliches System der Europäischen Thierwelt (etc.)
Genus.GenusDesignationPublicationName: , Appendix to A list of the genera of birds

Species.Author: Pallas
Species.OriginalPublicationName: Reise durch verschiedene Provinzen des Russischen Reichs
Species.Distribution: Vagrant. Pong (Himachal), Ladakh, Okhla (Delhi), and Bidar (N Karnataka).
Species.Specimens: FMNH

Genus.Name: Rissa
Genus.Author: Stephens
Genus.OriginalPublicationName: General Zoology, or systematic natural history

Species.Author: Linnaeus
Species.Taxonomy: Two subspecies likely in the region but no specimens have been collected.

Subspecies.Author: Linnaeus
Subspecies.OriginalPublicationName: Systema Naturæ per Regna Tria Naturæ, Secundum Classes, Ordines, Genera, Species, cum Characteribus, Differentiis, Synonymis, Locis. Tomus I. Editio decima, reformata
Subspecies.Distribution: Non-breeding: Recorded from Gilgit, Rajasthan, coasts of Maharashtra, Goa, and Kerala.
Subspecies.Notes: Subspecies assumed here as records from W India and N India are likely to be this subspecies breeding directly north in the Arctic tundra.

Subspecies.Author: Ridgway
Subspecies.OriginalPublicationName: Memoirs of the Museum of Comparative Zoölogy at Harvard College
Subspecies.Distribution: Vagrant. Majuli Is. and Deepor Beel (both Assam), Frazergunj (Bengal), Khudiya dam (Chhattisgarh), and Chandipur (Odisha).
Subspecies.Notes: This subspecies breeds in S & E China sea. There are a few records from Sichuan & Yunnan (China) and N Myanmar. These records lie between its established winter range and E India. Hence, it is likely that the Kittiwake records from E India may have been of this subspecies.

Genus.Name: Xema
Genus.Author: Leach
Genus.OriginalPublicationName: A voyage of discovery, made under the orders of the Admiralty, in His Majesty's ships Isabella and Alexander, for the purpose of exploring Baffin's Bay, and enquiring into the probability of a North-West Passage

Species.Author: Sabine
Species.Taxonomy: Sometimes treated as monotypic (H&M4, IOC).

Subspecies.Author: Sabine
Subspecies.OriginalPublicationName: Transactions of the Linnean Society of London
Subspecies.Distribution: Vagrant. Reported only from coastal Thrissur (Kerala).
Subspecies.Notes: Assumed to be this subspecies.

Genus.Name: Chroicocephalus
Genus.Author: Eyton
Genus.OriginalPublicationName: A History of the Rarer British Birds with a Catalogue of British Birds
Genus.GenusDesignationPublicationName: , A list of the genera of birds, with an indication of the typical species of each genus

Species.Author: di Brème
Species.OriginalPublicationName: Revue Zoologique, par la Société Cuvierienne
Species.Distribution: Breeding: Gujarat (locally). Winter: Extends to W coast, SE coast till about Pulicat as well as locally in N India mostly around Pong (Himachal) and Harike (Punjab) wetlands.
Species.Specimens: BNHS

Species.Author: Linnaeus
Species.OriginalPublicationName: Systema Naturæ. Editio duodecima reformata. Tomus I [part 1]
Species.Distribution: Winter: Ladakh, Indo-Gangetic and Brahmaputra plains, E Rajasthan, Gujarat, C India till about large rivers of Godavari and Krishna, both W and E coast as well as in off-shore waters. Straggler elsewhere in the country.
Species.Specimens: BNHS, ZSI, UMMZ, FMNH, YPM, TNHM

Species.Author: Jerdon
Species.OriginalPublicationName: Madras Journal of Literature and Science
Species.Distribution: Summer: Ladakh (Breeding). Winter: Indo-Gangetic and Brahmaputra plains, along large rivers in N and C India, Gujarat, and both W and E coast as well as in off-shore waters.
Species.Specimens: BNHS, ZSI, UMMZ, AMNH, FMNH, YPM, TNHM, LKO

Genus.Name: Leucophaeus
Genus.Author: Bruch
Genus.OriginalPublicationName: Journal für Ornithologie

Species.Author: Wagler
Species.OriginalPublicationName: Isis
Species.Distribution: Vagrant. Reported only from Morjim (Goa).

Genus.Name: Ichthyaetus
Genus.Author: Kaup
Genus.OriginalPublicationName: Skizzirte Entwickelungs-Geschichte und natürliches System der Europäischen Thierwelt (etc.)

Species.Author: Pallas
Species.OriginalPublicationName: Reise durch verschiedene Provinzen des Russischen Reichs
Species.Distribution: Summer: Ladakh, though not breeding. Winter: N India, E Rajasthan, lower course of Ganga in Bihar and S W Bengal, N Bengal, Brahmaputra plains, Arunachal, Manipur valley, Gujarat, W and E coast including off-shore waters.
Species.Specimens: BNHS, ZSI, MCZ, YPM, TNHM

Species.Author: Bruch
Species.OriginalPublicationName: Journal für Ornithologie
Species.Taxonomy: Follows H&M4 for dating it as 1853 contra 1855 in Dickinson _et al._ (2011); see also Praveen & Jayapal (2023).
Species.Distribution: Mumbai region with vagrants from Gujarat, Goa, Udupi (Karnataka), Ponnani (Kerala), Puthalam (Tamil Nadu) and a historical report from Chennai.
Species.Specimens: GMC

Species.Author: Temminck
Species.OriginalPublicationName: Nouveau recueil de planches coloriées d'oiseaux, pour servir de suite et de complément aux planches enluminées de Buffon
Species.Distribution: Vagrant. Reported only from Karwar beach (Karnataka).

Genus.Name: Larus
Genus.Author: Linnaeus
Genus.OriginalPublicationName: Systema Naturæ per Regna Tria Naturæ, Secundum Classes, Ordines, Genera, Species, cum Characteribus, Differentiis, Synonymis, Locis. Tomus I. Editio decima, reformata
Genus.GenusDesignationPublicationName: , A catalogue of the generic and sub-generic types of the class Aves, birds, arranged according to the natural system; with separate lists, distinguishing the various quarters of the globe in which they are to be procured

Species.Author: Linnaeus
Species.OriginalPublicationName: Systema Naturæ per Regna Tria Naturæ, Secundum Classes, Ordines, Genera, Species, cum Characteribus, Differentiis, Synonymis, Locis. Tomus I. Editio decima, reformata

Subspecies.Author: Homeyer
Subspecies.OriginalPublicationName: Naumannia
Subspecies.Distribution: Non-breeding: Reported from N India – Harike (Punjab), Nainital (Uttarakhand), Gajroula (Uttar Pradesh), Delhi, as well as W coast – Mandvi and Navbandhar (both Gujarat), Morjim (Goa), and Ponnani (Kerala).
Subspecies.Notes: Presumably this subspecies on range.

Species.Author: Sushkin
Species.AlternativeNames: [Herring Gull, American Herring Gull, Vega Gull]
Species.OriginalPublicationName: Proceedings of the Academy of Natural Sciences of Philadelphia

Subspecies.Author: Sushkin
Subspecies.OriginalPublicationName: Spisok i raspredelenie ptits Russkogo Altaia i blizhaishikh chastei Severo-Zapadnoi Mongolii: s opisaniem novykh ili maloizvestnykh form
Subspecies.Taxonomy: Taxonomy unresolved but _mongolicus_ included under _smithsonianus_ here following H&M4. But alternate treatments – under _argentatus_ (eBird/Clements) or _vegae_ (IOC) – also exist. Rarely, it is also considered a monotypic species.
Subspecies.Distribution: Winter: Reported from coasts of W Bengal and Odisha.
Subspecies.Notes: See Dutta (2013). Putative birds reported from Gujarat (Ganpule 2019) and Goa not assessed.

Species.Author: Pallas
Species.OriginalPublicationName: Zoographia Rosso-Asiatica, sistens omnium animalium in extenso Imperio Rossico (etc.)
Species.Distribution: Winter. NW India – from Gilgit, large wetlands of Himachal and Punjab, Uttar Pradesh, Rajasthan and Gujarat. Stragglers to Goa and Kerala.

Subspecies.Author: Linnaeus
Subspecies.OriginalPublicationName: Systema Naturæ per Regna Tria Naturæ, Secundum Classes, Ordines, Genera, Species, cum Characteribus, Differentiis, Synonymis, Locis. Tomus I. Editio decima, reformata
Subspecies.Distribution: Vagrant. Report only from Morjim, Goa.
Subspecies.Notes: See Williams & Gottschling (2018).

Subspecies.Author: Bree
Subspecies.OriginalPublicationName: A history of the birds of Europe, not observed in the British Isles
Subspecies.Distribution: Winter: Along the coasts, less regular in E coast compared to W coast. Rare inland, Andaman Is.
Subspecies.Notes: Also includes _taimyrensis_ Buturlin 1911 (See Ganpule 2016).

Subspecies.Author: Johansen
Subspecies.OriginalPublicationName: Journal für Ornithologie
Subspecies.Distribution: Winter: N India, Gujarat, W and E coast, and sporadically inland peninsular India.

Genus.Name: Rynchops
Genus.Author: Linnaeus
Genus.OriginalPublicationName: Systema Naturæ per Regna Tria Naturæ, Secundum Classes, Ordines, Genera, Species, cum Characteribus, Differentiis, Synonymis, Locis. Tomus I. Editio decima, reformata

Species.Author: Swainson
Species.OriginalPublicationName: Animals in Menageries. In: The Cabinet Cyclopædia conducted by the Rev. Dionysius Lardner
Species.Distribution: In select sites mostly along rivers in N, C, W, and E India with its regular range reaching south as far as Goa, Ballari (Karnataka), and Kakinada (Andhra). Rarely occurs further south in the peninsula as far as Kanya Kumari district (Tamil Nadu).
Species.Specimens: BNHS, UMZC, AMNH, FMNH, MCZ, YPM

Genus.Name: Gygis
Genus.Author: Wagler
Genus.OriginalPublicationName: Isis

Species.Author: Sparrman
Species.OriginalPublicationName: Museum Carlsonianum, in quo novas et selectas aves, coloribus ad vivum brevique descriptione illustratas (etc.)

Subspecies.Author: Gmelin
Subspecies.OriginalPublicationName: Systema Naturae. Editio decima tertia, aucta, reformata. Cura Jo. Frid. Gmelin (etc.). Tomus I. Pars II
Subspecies.Taxonomy: Birds expected here, that breed in Seychelles and Chagos, sometimes treated as _monte_ Mathews, 1912 included under this expected subspecies.
Subspecies.Distribution: Kerala.
Subspecies.Notes: Though all three recoveries from Kerala were handled and at least two of them handed over to a museum, none of the specimens could be preserved.

Genus.Name: Anous
Genus.Author: Stephens
Genus.OriginalPublicationName: General Zoology, or systematic natural history
Genus.GenusDesignationPublicationName: , A list of the genera of birds, with an indication of the typical species of each genus

Species.Author: Linnaeus
Species.OriginalPublicationName: Systema Naturæ per Regna Tria Naturæ, Secundum Classes, Ordines, Genera, Species, cum Characteribus, Differentiis, Synonymis, Locis. Tomus I. Editio decima, reformata

Subspecies.Author: Scopoli
Subspecies.OriginalPublicationName: Deliciae Florae et Faunae Insubricae
Subspecies.Distribution: Breeding: Pitti Is. (Lakshadweep). Non-breeding: Lakshadweep Sea, off-shore W coast from Mumbai south till S Kerala as well as E coast of Tamil Nadu and Andaman & Nicobar Is.

Subspecies.Author: Temminck
Subspecies.OriginalPublicationName: Nouveau recueil de planches coloriées d'oiseaux, pour servir de suite et de complément aux planches enluminées de Buffon
Subspecies.Distribution: Off-shore Kerala and Tamil Nadu – north till about Pulicat. Straggler further north in Maharashtra, Gujarat, and W. Bengal coasts.
Subspecies.Notes: Previous specimens misidentified (RA2012) and S. Andaman specimen has not been located in any museum. The only known preserved specimen is from Gujarat (FTLB GJ#138001)

Species.Author: Boie
Species.OriginalPublicationName: Isis

Subspecies.Author: McGregor
Subspecies.OriginalPublicationName: The Philippine Journal of Science
Subspecies.Distribution: Vagrant. Reported from Minicoy Is., mouth of Ganga in Sundarbans and Gujarat.
Subspecies.Notes: RA2012 already analysed the specimens in NHM and could not ascribe a subspecies but this taxon likely in the region.

Genus.Name: Onychoprion
Genus.Author: Wagler
Genus.OriginalPublicationName: Isis

Species.Author: Linnaeus
Species.OriginalPublicationName: Systema Naturæ. Editio duodecima reformata. Tomus I [part 1]

Subspecies.Author: Sparrman
Subspecies.OriginalPublicationName: Museum Carlsonianum, in quo novas et selectas aves, coloribus ad vivum brevique descriptione illustratas (etc.)
Subspecies.Distribution: Breeding: Vengurla Is., Pitti Is. (Lakshadweep – formerly other atolls too). Non-breeding: Off-shores waters of W India but frequently storm-blown inland. Also, occurs sporadically along the E coastal waters and Andaman Sea region.

Species.Author: Scopoli
Species.OriginalPublicationName: Deliciae Florae et Faunae Insubricae

Subspecies.Author: Lesson
Subspecies.OriginalPublicationName: Traité d'Ornithologie, ou Tableau Méthodique des ordres, sous-ordres, familles, tribus, genres, sous-genres et races d'oiseaux
Subspecies.Taxonomy: This subspecies sometimes lumped with the nominate subspecies.
Subspecies.Distribution: Breeding: Vengurla Is, and atolls in Lakshadweep (at least historical). Non-breeding: Western coastal off-shore waters, Lakshadweep, south-eastern coastal waters. Also, around Andaman & Nicobar Is. Rarely storm-blown inland in comparison with Sooty Terns.
Subspecies.Notes: Regional population augmented by extralimital visitors, possibly from the Red Sea region.

Genus.Name: Sternula
Genus.Author: Boie
Genus.OriginalPublicationName: Isis

Subspecies.Author: Pallas
Subspecies.OriginalPublicationName: Adumbratiunculæ. Avium variarum praecedenti elencho insertarum, sed quæ in Systemate Naturæ Illustr. Linnæi nondum extant
Subspecies.Distribution: Non-breeding: W coast – at least in Gujarat, Maharashtra, and perhaps Lakshadweep Is.
Subspecies.Notes: Non-breeding distribution of the regional subspecies insufficiently worked out.

Subspecies.Author: Gmelin
Subspecies.OriginalPublicationName: Systema Naturae. Editio decima tertia, aucta, reformata. Cura Jo. Frid. Gmelin (etc.). Tomus I. Pars II
Subspecies.Taxonomy: Includes _pusilla_, which was formerly accorded subspecies status. See Abdulali (1964) for a treatment of the two subspecies found in India.
Subspecies.Distribution: Breeding: Islands of large rivers in Indo-Gangetic plains, inland reservoirs of peninsular India as well as coastal waters including islets of Mumbai and Rameswaram Is. Non-breeding: Presumably more coastal in both W and E coast – more frequently the latter. Also, Andaman & Nicobar Is.
Subspecies.Notes: Andaman & Nicobar Is. birds probably this subspecies on range.

Species.Author: Hume
Species.OriginalPublicationName: Stray Feathers
Species.Distribution: W Gujarat (breeding) and Lakshadweep; straggling to SW coast.
Species.Specimens: BNHS

Genus.Name: Gelochelidon
Genus.Author: Brehm
Genus.OriginalPublicationName: Isis

Subspecies.Author: Gmelin
Subspecies.OriginalPublicationName: Systema Naturae. Editio decima tertia, aucta, reformata. Cura Jo. Frid. Gmelin (etc.). Tomus I. Pars II
Subspecies.Distribution: Winter: N India including Jammu, Himachal, and Delhi region; E Rajasthan, Gujarat, along the western seaboard, as well as E coast; sporadic inland in Gangetic plains, C India, and Deccan.

Subspecies.Author: Horsfield
Subspecies.OriginalPublicationName: Transactions of the Linnean Society of London
Subspecies.Distribution: Winter: Odisha and W Bengal coasts apart from Andaman Is.
Subspecies.Notes: Subspecies overlap in winter and range statements tentative. Breeding reports from Chilika and W Bengal not investigated.

Species.Author: Pallas

Species.Distribution: Winter: Gujarat (breeding locally in W Gujarat), W and E coast; straggling inland during migration.
Species.Specimens: AMNH, YPM, TNHM, GMC

Genus.Name: Chlidonias

Genus.OriginalPublicationName: Kentucky Gazette, new series

Subspecies.Author: Pallas
Subspecies.OriginalPublicationName: Zoographia Rosso-Asiatica, sistens omnium animalium in extenso Imperio Rossico (etc.)
Subspecies.Taxonomy: Includes _indicus_ Stephens, 1826.
Subspecies.Distribution: Breeding: Kashmir, locally in Gangetic plains till Bihar, Gujarat, Sundarbans (?), Assam. Non-breeding: Throughout the country – inland, coasts and immediately adjacent off-shore waters as well as Andaman Is.
Subspecies.Specimens: BNHS, ZSI, UMMZ, AMNH, FMNH, YPM, TNHM
Subspecies.Notes: Donahue & Ganguli (1965) for a breeding site review; Ranade (2011) for Assam breeding.

Subspecies.Author: Linnaeus
Subspecies.OriginalPublicationName: Systema Naturæ per Regna Tria Naturæ, Secundum Classes, Ordines, Genera, Species, cum Characteribus, Differentiis, Synonymis, Locis. Tomus I. Editio decima, reformata
Subspecies.Distribution: Vagrant. Reported from Dwaraka, Jamnagar, and Nalsarovar (all Gujarat), Karwar (Karnataka), and Kochi (Kerala).
Subspecies.Notes: Subspecies assumed based on range. The non-breeding specimen from Point Calimere (BNHS #26690) is a White-winged Tern.

Species.Author: Temminck
Species.OriginalPublicationName: Manuel d'ornithologie, ou tableau systématique des oiseaux qui se trouvent en Europe (etc.)
Species.Distribution: Winter: Gujarat, coastal plains of C Kerala and Tamil Nadu; Andaman Is. During migration inland throughout the peninsula.
Species.Specimens: BNHS, ZSI, AMNH

Genus.Name: Sterna
Genus.Author: Linnaeus
Genus.OriginalPublicationName: Systema Naturæ per Regna Tria Naturæ, Secundum Classes, Ordines, Genera, Species, cum Characteribus, Differentiis, Synonymis, Locis. Tomus I. Editio decima, reformata

Species.Author: Gray
Species.OriginalPublicationName: Illustrations of Indian zoology; chiefly selected from the collection of Major-General Hardwicke, F. R. S.
Species.Distribution: Across India except the high Himalaya, trans-Himalaya and certain NE states like Manipur and Mizoram.
Species.Specimens: BNHS, ZSI, UMZC, UMMZ, AMNH, FMNH, MCZ, ROM, USNM, YPM

Species.OriginalPublicationName: Den Danske Atlas eller Konge-Riget Dannemark (etc.)

Subspecies.Author: Linnaeus
Subspecies.OriginalPublicationName: Systema Naturæ per Regna Tria Naturæ, Secundum Classes, Ordines, Genera, Species, cum Characteribus, Differentiis, Synonymis, Locis. Tomus I. Editio decima, reformata
Subspecies.Distribution: W Gujarat.
Subspecies.Notes: No Indian specimen reported by AR2001 or RA2012 specifically of this subspecies from India.

Subspecies.Author: Saunders
Subspecies.OriginalPublicationName: Proceedings of the Zoological Society of London
Subspecies.Taxonomy: Includes _minussensis_ Sushkin 1925 which is sometimes recognised (IOC) but usually considered an intermediate between nominate and _tibetana_. However, it is quite likely that the birds from the breeding range of its type (Minusinsky district, Russia) winters in India.
Subspecies.Distribution: Breeding: Ladakh. Non-breeding: Entire seaboard of peninsular India and adjoining off-shore waters. Also, Lakshadweep and Andaman Is. including the off-shore thereof.

Subspecies.Author: Nordmann
Subspecies.OriginalPublicationName: Reise um die Erde durch Nord-Asien und die beiden Oceane, in den Jahren 1828, 1829 und 1830 ausgeführt. Naturhistorischer Atlas: Verzeichniss von Thieren und Pflanzen, welche auf einer Reise um die Erde gesammelt wurden
Subspecies.Distribution: Off-shore SW coast.
Subspecies.Notes: Included based on photos in Praveen _et al._ (2011).

Species.Author: Hartert
Species.OriginalPublicationName: Novitates Zoologicae
Species.Distribution: Breeding in Vengurla rocks. Sporadic in coastal as well as offshore waters in W coast from Gujarat till Kerala, Lakshadweep Is. Straggler to the E coast (Chennai).
Species.Specimens: BNHS, NHMUK

Subspecies.Author: Raffles
Subspecies.OriginalPublicationName: Transactions of the Linnean Society of London
Subspecies.Distribution: Andaman Sea around Andaman & Nicobar Is – breeding in the islets of Andaman Is. (at least historically).

Subspecies.Author: Stresemann
Subspecies.OriginalPublicationName: Novitates Zoologicae
Subspecies.Distribution: Vagrant. Reported from Ponnani (Kerala).
Subspecies.Notes: Kerala report (Iyer 2018) presumably of this subspecies.

Species.Author: Montagu
Species.OriginalPublicationName: Supplement to the Ornithological Dictionary, or Synopsis of British Birds

Subspecies.Author: Mathews
Subspecies.OriginalPublicationName: The birds of Australia
Subspecies.Taxonomy: Sometimes included under _bangsi_ Mathews, 1912.
Subspecies.Distribution: Off-shore S Kerala.
Subspecies.Notes: May occur as it is the breeding subspecies in Maldives.

Subspecies.Author: Hume
Subspecies.OriginalPublicationName: Stray Feathers
Subspecies.Distribution: Breeding: Vengurla Is., Rameswaram Is. (historically), and S Andaman Is. (at least historical). Non-breeding: Off-shore waters of W coast roughly south of Vengurla till about C Kerala, off-shore Chennai and around Andaman Is.
Subspecies.Notes: Specimen in GMC collected from Rameswaram in June 1914 (Abdulali 1942) should refer to this subspecies as it is the subspecies that breeds in Sri Lanka on the Adam's bridge.

Species.Author: Gray
Species.OriginalPublicationName: Illustrations of Indian zoology; chiefly selected from the collection of Major-General Hardwicke, F. R. S.
Species.Distribution: In select sites across India from Jammu along the Indo-Gangetic plains extending to the Brahmaputra plains, rivers of N, C, and S India except the Thar region.

Species.Author: Latham
Species.OriginalPublicationName: Supplement to the general synopsis of birds
Species.Distribution: Winter: Gujarat and W coast as well as along the E coast till about Pulicat and straggling further north.

Subspecies.Distribution: Breeding: Vengurla Is., Pitti Is. (Lakshadweep), Sundarbans (?). Non-breeding: Along the W and E coast including off-shore waters as well as Lakshadweep. Almost never inland.

Subspecies.Author: Stephens
Subspecies.OriginalPublicationName: General Zoology, or systematic natural history
Subspecies.Distribution: Non-breeding: Andaman Sea around Andaman & Nicobar Is.

Genus.Name: Phaethon

Subspecies.Distribution: Non-breeding: Bay of Bengal, Andaman Sea, off-shore W coast and stragglers elsewhere.
Subspecies.Notes: Regional birds assumed to be from the Indian ocean breeding population.

Species.Author: Gmelin
Species.OriginalPublicationName: Systema Naturae. Editio decima tertia, aucta, reformata. Cura Jo. Frid. Gmelin (etc.). Tomus I. Pars II

Subspecies.Author: Hume

Species.Distribution: Throughout India south of the Himalayan ranges – Punjab in the north till the southern tip of the peninsula, NE India, Andaman & Nicobar Is.
Species.Specimens: BNHS, ZSI, UMZC, UMMZ, AMNH, FMNH, MCZ, ROM, YPM, TNHM, LKO

Genus.Name: Ciconia

Species.Distribution: Winter: Throughout India including NE India; but mostly a straggler in Indo-Gangetic plains and E India from W Bengal till Tamil Nadu.
Species.Specimens: BNHS, UMZC, UMMZ

Species.Author: Boddaert
Species.AlternativeNames: White-necked Stork, [Asian Woollyneck], Asian Woolly-necked Stork

Subspecies.Author: Boddaert
Subspecies.OriginalPublicationName: Table des planches enluminéez d'histoire naturelle de M. D'Aubenton
Subspecies.Distribution: Throughout India from south of Jammu till the southern tip of the peninsula. Also, in Brahmaputra plains of Assam and adjoining Arunachal – sporadically in NE hill states like Nagaland, Meghalaya, as well as Cachar.

Subspecies.Author: Linnaeus
Subspecies.OriginalPublicationName: Systema Naturæ per Regna Tria Naturæ, Secundum Classes, Ordines, Genera, Species, cum Characteribus, Differentiis, Synonymis, Locis. Tomus I. Editio decima, reformata
Subspecies.Distribution: Vagrant (?). Reported only from Rajasthan and S Tamil Nadu.
Subspecies.Notes: Ringing recovery of two German birds (Balachandran _et al._ 2018) in India (Bikaner and Tirunelveli) confirms the presence of the nominate subspecies that breeds in Europe. Current specimens listed here following the respective museum catalogues but see next taxa.

Subspecies.Author: Severtsov
Subspecies.OriginalPublicationName: Izvestiya Imperatorskago Obshchestva Lyubitelei Estestvoznaniya, Antropologii i Etnografii
Subspecies.Taxonomy: Scarcely distinct (see Biswas 1964) and probably best considered monotypic.
Subspecies.Distribution: Winter: Himalayan foothills of Uttarakhand, Delhi region, formerly Gangetic plains till about W Bengal (no recent reports), Rajasthan, Gujarat, W Maharashtra, W and S Karnataka, S Andhra, Kerala, and Tamil Nadu. Formerly also C India now only stragglers there.
Subspecies.Notes: Assumed most birds are of this subspecies though regional wintering populations of the nominate subspecies cannot be ruled out. Specimens are difficult to assign to subspecies but RA2012 treats regional birds as this.

Genus.Name: Ephippiorhynchus
Genus.Author: Bonaparte
Genus.OriginalPublicationName: Conspectus generum avium

Subspecies.Author: Latham
Subspecies.OriginalPublicationName: Index ornithologicus, sive systema ornithologiæ; complectens avium divisionem in classes, ordines, genera, species, ipsarumque varietates: adjectis synonymis, locis, descriptionibus, &c.
Subspecies.Distribution: Most of northern peninsular lowlands – along the Indo-Gangetic plains and Brahmaputra plains in Assam; E Rajasthan (not in Thar desert), Gujarat, locally in Madhya Pradesh, N Maharashtra, and coastal Odisha.
Subspecies.Notes: Formerly much more widespread in peninsular India except S India. No definitive reports of Sri Lankan population straggling to S Tamil Nadu.

Genus.Name: Leptoptilos

Species.OriginalPublicationName: Systema Naturae. Editio decima tertia, aucta, reformata. Cura Jo. Frid. Gmelin (etc.). Tomus I. Pars II

Genus.Name: Mycteria

Subspecies.Distribution: Throughout India in wet habitats from about Jammu through Indo-Gangetic and Brahmaputra plains, E Rajasthan, Gujarat, C India, Odisha coast, NE Andhra, Coromandel coast, and western coastal strip. Sporadic or local in Deccan, Andaman & Nicobar Is.

Species.Author: Gmelin
Species.OriginalPublicationName: Systema Naturae. Editio decima tertia, aucta, reformata. Cura Jo. Frid. Gmelin (etc.). Tomus I. Pars II

Species.Specimens: BNHS, ZSI, UMZC, UMMZ, AMNH, FMNH, MCZ, ROM, USNM, YPM, TNHM, LKO

Subspecies.Author: Linnaeus
Subspecies.OriginalPublicationName: Systema Naturæ. Editio duodecima reformata. Tomus I [part 1]
Subspecies.Distribution: Breeding: Kashmir. Non-breeding: Possibly all passage migrants in NW India – mainly Delhi region, Rajasthan, and Gujarat. Stragglers further south.
Subspecies.Notes: Trivedi & Parasharya (2019) suspected breeding Gujarat. Reports from NE India not considered definitive (RA2012).

Species.Author: Gmelin
Species.OriginalPublicationName: Systema Naturae. Editio decima tertia, aucta, reformata. Cura Jo. Frid. Gmelin (etc.). Tomus I. Pars II
Species.Distribution: Throughout India south of the Himalayan foothills from Jammu and Punjab; sporadic in W Rajasthan and NC India, Assam plains, Meghalaya, Manipur valley, Mizoram, and Tripura. Also, Lakshadweep, Andaman & Nicobar Is.
Species.Specimens: BNHS, ZSI, NHMUK, UMMZ, AMNH, FMNH, MCZ, USNM, TNHM

Genus.Name: Nycticorax
Genus.Author: Forster

Subspecies.Author: Linnaeus
Subspecies.OriginalPublicationName: Systema Naturæ per Regna Tria Naturæ, Secundum Classes, Ordines, Genera, Species, cum Characteribus, Differentiis, Synonymis, Locis. Tomus I. Editio decima, reformata
Subspecies.Distribution: Throughout India – from trans-Himalaya of Ladakh, through Kashmir till NE India (not reported from Mizoram) and entire southern peninsula – reported from the islands of Lakshadweep, S Andaman, Narcondam, and Great Nicobar.
Subspecies.Specimens: BNHS, ZSI, UMZC, AMNH, FMNH, MCZ, ROM, YPM, TNHM

Genus.Name: Gorsachius
Genus.Author: Bonaparte
Genus.OriginalPublicationName: Conspectus generum avium

Subspecies.Author: Raffles
Subspecies.OriginalPublicationName: Transactions of the Linnean Society of London
Subspecies.Taxonomy: SW Ghats population brighter rufous (RA2012) – no subspecies assigned.
Subspecies.Distribution: N Bengal, Assam, adjoining lowland Arunachal, Nagaland, Meghalaya, Cachar, Manipur, Tripura, and Mizoram – as well as Andaman Is. (breeding?). Disjunctly in W Ghats, south of SW Maharashtra till southern tip of the Ghats in Kanyakumari district. Sporadically elsewhere in E coast and C India during non-breeding months.
Subspecies.Notes: Migration little understood but non-breeding population in Sri Lanka possibly from the W Ghats.

Subspecies.Author: Hachisuka
Subspecies.OriginalPublicationName: Ibis
Subspecies.Taxonomy: Not always recognised (IOC); whence the species treated as monotypic. Andaman birds, seen even during breeding season, might breed there and may represent another taxonomically valid unit.
Subspecies.Distribution: C Nicobar Is. (Tillangchong, Teresa, Kamorta, and Katchal) and S Nicobar (Great Nicobar Is).

Genus.Name: Egretta
Genus.Author: Forster
Genus.OriginalPublicationName: A synoptical catalogue of British birds; intended to identify the species mentioned by different names in several catalogues already extant

Species.Author: Swinhoe
