Subspecies.OriginalPublicationName: American Museum Novitates
Subspecies.Distribution: N Arunachal.
Subspecies.Notes: Reports from Gelling, Mechuka, and Upper Dibang valley in Arunachal may refer to this subspecies.

Subspecies.Author: Hume
Subspecies.OriginalPublicationName: Stray Feathers
Subspecies.Taxonomy: Includes _cruentipectus_ Koelz 1954 from Sangau, Mizoram.
Subspecies.Distribution: Nagaland, Cachar, Manipur, and Mizoram.
Subspecies.Notes: Khasi hills (AR2001) claim not investigated.

Genus.Name: Blythipicus
Genus.Author: Bonaparte
Genus.OriginalPublicationName: Ateneo Italiano
Genus.GenusDesignationPublicationName: , Catalogue of the genera and subgenera of birds contained in the British Museum

Subspecies.Author: Hodgson
Subspecies.OriginalPublicationName: Journal of the Asiatic Society of Bengal
Subspecies.Taxonomy: Includes _porphyreus_ Koelz 1954 from Nongph, Khasi hills, Meghalaya and _pyrrhopipra_ Koelz 1954 from Karong, Manipur.
Subspecies.Distribution: N Bengal, Sikkim, Assam, Arunachal, Nagaland, Meghalaya, Cachar, Manipur, and Mizoram.
Subspecies.Specimens: BNHS, NHMUK, UMMZ, FMNH, MCZ, ROM, USNM, YPM, TNHM

Genus.Name: Chrysocolaptes
Genus.Author: Blyth
Genus.OriginalPublicationName: Journal of the Asiatic Society of Bengal
Genus.GenusDesignationPublicationName: , Catalogue of the birds in the British Museum

Species.Author: Tickell
Species.AlternativeNames: Greater Golden-backed Woodpecker, Large Golden-backed Woodpecker

Subspecies.Author: Hodgson
Subspecies.OriginalPublicationName: Journal of the Asiatic Society of Bengal
Subspecies.Distribution: E Himachal, adjoining Haryana, Uttarakhand, and NW Uttar Pradesh.

Subspecies.Author: Tickell
Subspecies.OriginalPublicationName: Journal of the Asiatic Society of Bengal
Subspecies.Taxonomy: Includes _delesserti_ Malherbe 1849 from India (restricted to Kolkata).
Subspecies.Distribution: NE Uttar Pradesh, Bihar, N Bengal. Sikkim, Assam, Arunachal, and all NE hill states. Also, in much of W Bengal, adjoining E Jharkhand, Odisha, S Chhattisgarh, N Telangana, and NE Andhra.
Subspecies.Specimens: BNHS, ZSI, NHMUK, UMMZ, FMNH, MCZ, ROM, USNM, YPM, TNHM

Species.Author: Koelz
Species.OriginalPublicationName: Proceedings of the Biological Society of Washington
Species.Taxonomy: AR2001, rather incorrectly, synonymises with _chersonesus_ Kloss, 1918 of Malaya – which itself is now treated as a synonym of extralimital _indomalayicus_ Hesse 1911 (see H&M4). Previously lumped with _C guttacristatus_ (see Abhirami _et al._ 2021) and sometimes continues to be treated there (see HBW/BLI).
Species.Distribution: W Ghats and associated midlands from Surat Dangs south till Kanyakumari district also extends into SE Ghats as well as CE Ghats of Nallamala hills.
Species.Specimens: BNHS, ZSI, NHMUK, FMNH, TNHM, MYS

Subspecies.Author: Boddaert
Subspecies.OriginalPublicationName: Table des planches enluminéez d'histoire naturelle de M. D'Aubenton
Subspecies.Distribution: Throughout Indian peninsula from Uttarakhand south through W Rajasthan (sporadic in Thar), C India; west till E Gujarat, east till Jharkhand and adjoining W Bengal; south through NW Ghats and NE Ghats, Deccan hillocks till S Tamil Nadu but absent in most of W coastal plains south of Goa as well as E coastal plains.
Subspecies.Specimens: BNHS, NHMUK, UMMZ, AMNH, FMNH, MCZ, YPM

Genus.Name: Micropternus
Genus.Author: Blyth
Genus.OriginalPublicationName: Journal of the Asiatic Society of Bengal

Species.Author: Vieillot
Species.OriginalPublicationName: Nouveau dictionnaire d'histoire naturelle, appliquée aux arts, à l'agriculture, à l'économie rurale et domestique, à la médecine, etc. Nouvelle édition

Subspecies.Author: Kloss
Subspecies.OriginalPublicationName: Ibis
Subspecies.Distribution: SE Himachal, Uttarakhand, and NW Uttar Pradesh.

Subspecies.Author: Malherbe
Subspecies.OriginalPublicationName: Revue et Magasin de Zoologie Pure et Appliquée
Subspecies.Taxonomy: Includes _kanarae_ Koelz 1950 from Londa, Belagavi district, N Karnataka. ZSI#35630 collected in 1848 by Jerdon listed as 'Holotype'. Also includes _gularis_ Jerdon 1845.
Subspecies.Distribution: W Ghats from Surat Dangs south till Kanyakumari district.; SE Ghats till Bengaluru and Vellore (N Tamil Nadu).
Subspecies.Specimens: BNHS, NHMUK, UMMZ, AMNH, FMNH, MYS

Subspecies.Author: Blyth
Subspecies.OriginalPublicationName: Journal of the Asiatic Society of Bengal
Subspecies.Taxonomy: Includes _mesos_ Kloss 1918 from Cuttack, Odisha.
Subspecies.Distribution: N Bengal, Sikkim, Assam, Arunachal, and all NE hill states; also in S W Bengal, Jharkhand, Odisha, Chhattisgarh, E Madhya Pradesh, E Maharashtra, and NE Andhra till the CE Ghats in Telangana.
Subspecies.Specimens: BNHS, ZSI, NHMUK, UMMZ, AMNH, FMNH

Genus.Name: Gecinulus
Genus.Author: Blyth
Genus.OriginalPublicationName: Journal of the Asiatic Society of Bengal

Subspecies.Author: Horsfield
Subspecies.OriginalPublicationName: Proceedings of the Zoological Society of London
Subspecies.Taxonomy: Includes _aristus_ Koelz 1954 from Hmuntha, Mizo hills.
Subspecies.Distribution: N Bengal, Sikkim, Assam, Arunachal, Nagaland, Meghalaya, Manipur, and Mizoram.
Subspecies.Specimens: BNHS, ZSI, NHMUK, UMMZ, FMNH, MCZ, ROM, USNM, YPM, LKO

Genus.Name: Dinopium
Genus.Author: Rafinesque
Genus.OriginalPublicationName: Principes Fondamentaux de Somiologie

Species.Author: Vigors
Species.AlternativeNames: Himalayan Golden-backed Woodpecker, Himalayan Golden-backed Three-toed Woodpecker

Subspecies.Author: Vigors
Subspecies.OriginalPublicationName: Proceedings of the Committee of Science and Correspondence of the Zoological Society of London
Subspecies.Distribution: Along the sub-Himalayan foothills from SE Himachal and NE Haryana, Uttarakhand, N Uttar Pradesh, N Bihar, and N Bengal. Historically in E Ghats, at least locally till Tamil Nadu.
Subspecies.Notes: Reports from NE India not evaluated. Peninsular distribution after Abdulali (1973).

Species.Author: Ljungh
Species.AlternativeNames: Common Golden-backed Woodpecker, Indian Golden-backed Three-toed Woodpecker
Species.OriginalPublicationName: Kongliga Svenska Vetenskaps-Akademiens Handlingar

Subspecies.Author: Whistler
Subspecies.OriginalPublicationName: Journal of the Bombay Natural History Society
Subspecies.Taxonomy: The type specimen, though used to be present in NHUMUK, now not listed in their type catalogue.
Subspecies.Distribution: W Ghats south from Goa till southern tip in Tamil Nadu – sporadically east through the spur hills to Biligirirangans and Perumparai.
Subspecies.Specimens: BNHS, NHMUK, AMNH, FMNH, USNM, YPM, TNHM

Subspecies.Author: Blyth
Subspecies.OriginalPublicationName: Journal of the Asiatic Society of Bengal
Subspecies.Distribution: NE Ghats of Andhra – historically in NE India.
Subspecies.Notes: Reports in Assam south of Brahmaputra, Manipur, and Tripura (all in AR2001) not evaluated as there are no specimens (RA2012) or photographs. NE Ghats subspecies presumed to be this rather than _malabaricum_. Nearest occurrence is in the Sundarbans of Bangladesh and hence may occur in the Indian side as well but reports from there not evaluated here.

Subspecies.Author: Linnaeus
Subspecies.OriginalPublicationName: Systema Naturæ per Regna Tria Naturæ, Secundum Classes, Ordines, Genera, Species, cum Characteribus, Differentiis, Synonymis, Locis. Tomus I. Editio decima, reformata
Subspecies.Taxonomy: Includes _palliolatus_ Van Tyle & Koelz 1936 from Bhadwar, Himachal.
Subspecies.Distribution: Northern subcontinent from Himachal, Haryana, through Gangetic plain till W Bengal; west through W Rajasthan and Gujarat; C India till about N Maharashtra; NE Ghats including NE Andhra; east through N Bengal, Sikkim, Assam, adjoining Arunachal, Nagaland, Meghalaya, Cachar, Manipur, Mizoram, and Tripura.
Subspecies.Specimens: BNHS, ZSI, NHMUK, UMMZ, AMNH, FMNH, MCZ, ROM, USNM, YPM, HYD

Subspecies.Author: Blyth
Subspecies.OriginalPublicationName: Catalogue of the birds in the Museum Asiatic Society
Subspecies.Taxonomy: Based on AR2001 and H&M4, _girensis_ Koelz 1954 from Sasan, Junagadh included under this subspecies. However, investigation is required if _girensis_ is a synonym of the nominate subspecies. Normally, Gujarat is not included in the range of _dilutum_.
Subspecies.Distribution: NW India – Jammu, Punjab, and Rajasthan.
Subspecies.Notes: Jammu birds assigned here based on range.

Subspecies.Author: Whistler & Kinnear
Subspecies.OriginalPublicationName: Journal of the Bombay Natural History Society
Subspecies.Taxonomy: Includes _woodi_ Koelz 1939 from Jagalbet, NW Karnataka.
Subspecies.Distribution: W coast and foothills of W Ghats from Goa south till S tip of the peninsula.
Subspecies.Specimens: BNHS, NHMUK, FMNH, USNM, YPM, TNHM

Subspecies.Author: Malherbe
Subspecies.OriginalPublicationName: Revue Zoologique, par la Société Cuvierienne
Subspecies.Distribution: C India, W Maharashtra, Telangana, Andhra, much of Deccan Karnataka, and C and E Tamil Nadu.
Subspecies.Specimens: BNHS, ZSI, NHMUK, AMNH, FMNH, MCZ, ROM, USNM, YPM

Genus.Name: Picus
Genus.Author: Linnaeus
Genus.OriginalPublicationName: Systema Naturæ per Regna Tria Naturæ, Secundum Classes, Ordines, Genera, Species, cum Characteribus, Differentiis, Synonymis, Locis. Tomus I. Editio decima, reformata
Genus.GenusDesignationPublicationName: , Zoological Illustrations

Species.Author: Vieillot
Species.AlternativeNames: Lesser Yellow-naped Woodpecker, Small Yellow-naped Woodpecker

Subspecies.Author: Vieillot
Subspecies.OriginalPublicationName: Nouveau dictionnaire d'histoire naturelle, appliquée aux arts, à l'agriculture, à l'économie rurale et domestique, à la médecine, etc. Nouvelle édition
Subspecies.Distribution: N Bengal, Sikkim, Assam, Arunachal, and all NE hill states, as well as lower W Bengal and adjoining Bihar. Disjunctly in NE Ghats of Odisha, NE Andhra, and Chhattisgarh.
Subspecies.Specimens: BNHS, ZSI, NHMUK, UMMZ, FMNH, MCZ, USNM, YPM

Subspecies.Author: Meinertzhagen
Subspecies.OriginalPublicationName: Bulletin of the British Ornithologists' Club
Subspecies.Distribution: W Himalayan foothills of Kashmir, Jammu, Himachal, adjoining Haryana, Uttarakhand, and N Uttar Pradesh.
Subspecies.Specimens: BNHS, NHMUK, UMMZ, AMNH, FMNH, MCZ, USNM, YPM

Subspecies.Author: Jerdon
Subspecies.OriginalPublicationName: Madras Journal of Literature and Science
Subspecies.Taxonomy: Exact transition zone between this and the nominate subspecies in C India not worked out. In the E Ghats, the Krishna-Godavari floodplains separate the subspecies.
Subspecies.Distribution: C Indian hills, W Ghats from Surat Dangs south till Kanyakumari district and SE Ghats extending till Nallamala ranges in CE Ghats.
Subspecies.Specimens: BNHS, ZSI, NHMUK, UMMZ, AMNH, FMNH, MCZ, USNM, YPM, TNHM, MYS

Species.Author: Gray & Gray
Species.OriginalPublicationName: Catalogue of the specimens and drawings of mammalia and birds of Nepal and Thibet. Presented by B. H. Hodgson, Esq. to the British Museum
Species.Taxonomy: AR2001 and Ri1982 used its junior synonym _myrmecophoneus_ Stresemann 1920 but corrected by H&M4. Includes _dehrae_ Baker 1926 from Dehradun and _dawae_ Van Type & Koelz 1936 from Bhadwar, Himachal.
Species.Distribution: Through the foot of the Himalaya from Jammu, Kangra (Himachal), Uttarakhand, terai of Uttar Pradesh and Bihar along the Nepal border, W Bengal, Assam, Meghalaya, Cachar, and Tripura. Locally in the hills of peninsular India from Mt. Abu, Satpuras, NE Ghats, SE Ghats, Surat Dangs as well as the W Ghats and associated midlands from Goa, south till the southern tip of the Ghats in Kanyakumari district (Tamil Nadu).
Species.Specimens: BNHS, ZSI, NHMUK, UMMZ, AMNH, FMNH, MCZ, USNM, YPM, TNHM, LKO

Species.Author: Vigors
Species.AlternativeNames: Scaly-bellied Green Woodpecker, Large Scaly-bellied Green Woodpecker

Subspecies.Author: Vigors
Subspecies.OriginalPublicationName: Proceedings of the Committee of Science and Correspondence of the Zoological Society of London
Subspecies.Distribution: Himalaya of Gilgit, Kashmir, Jammu, Himachal, and Uttarakhand.
Subspecies.Specimens: BNHS, ZSI, NHMUK, UMMZ, AMNH, FMNH, MCZ, ROM, YPM

Species.Author: Gmelin
Species.OriginalPublicationName: Systema Naturae. Editio decima tertia, aucta, reformata. Cura Jo. Frid. Gmelin (etc.). Tomus I [pars I]

Subspecies.Author: Rippon
Subspecies.OriginalPublicationName: Bulletin of the British Ornithologists' Club
Subspecies.Taxonomy: Sometimes SE Tibetan population known by name _kogo_ Bianchi 1906.
Subspecies.Distribution: N Siang valley and Upper Dibang valley in N Arunachal.
Subspecies.Notes: Only sight records till date from Upper Dibang valley.

Subspecies.Author: Gyldenstolpe
Subspecies.OriginalPublicationName: Ornithologische Monatsberichte
Subspecies.Taxonomy: Includes _gyldenstolpei_ Baker 1918.
Subspecies.Distribution: N Bengal, Sikkim, Assam, Arunachal, and all NE hill states. Disjunctly in NE Ghats of Odisha and NE Andhra.
Subspecies.Specimens: BNHS, ZSI, NHMUK, UMMZ, AMNH, FMNH, USNM, TNHM

Subspecies.Author: Baker
Subspecies.OriginalPublicationName: Bulletin of the British Ornithologists' Club
Subspecies.Taxonomy: New name for _Picus occipitalis_ Vigors.
Subspecies.Distribution: Along the Himalaya from Kashmir through Jammu, Himachal, Uttarakhand, and adjoining areas in Punjab, Haryana, and N Uttar Pradesh.
Subspecies.Specimens: BNHS, NHMUK, UMMZ, AMNH, FMNH, MCZ, USNM, YPM

Genus.Name: Chrysophlegma
Genus.Author: Gould
Genus.OriginalPublicationName: The birds of Asia

Subspecies.Author: Koelz
Subspecies.OriginalPublicationName: American Museum Novitates
Subspecies.Distribution: Uttarakhand.

Subspecies.Author: Gould
Subspecies.OriginalPublicationName: Proceedings of the Zoological Society of London
Subspecies.Distribution: N Bengal, Sikkim, Assam, Arunachal, and all NE hill states. Disjunctly in Sundarbans (S W Bengal), Chota Nagpur plateau of Odisha and Jharkhand, NE Ghats of Chhattisgarh, and NE Andhra.
Subspecies.Specimens: BNHS, ZSI, NHMUK, UMMZ, AMNH, FMNH, YPM, TNHM

Genus.Name: Mulleripicus
Genus.Author: Bonaparte
Genus.OriginalPublicationName: Ateneo Italiano

Species.Author: Temminck
Species.OriginalPublicationName: Nouveau recueil de planches coloriées d'oiseaux, pour servir de suite et de complément aux planches enluminées de Buffon

Subspecies.Author: Ripley
Subspecies.OriginalPublicationName: Proceedings of the Biological Society of Washington
Subspecies.Taxonomy: Sometimes subsumed under _harterti_.
Subspecies.Distribution: E Himachal (historical), S Uttarakhand, NW Uttar Pradesh, formerly continuous till Assam valley – but now populations known only from Manas (Assam) and Nameri-Pakke (Assam-Arunachal border).

Subspecies.Author: Hesse
Subspecies.OriginalPublicationName: Ornithologische Monatsberichte
Subspecies.Distribution: Namdapha and adjoining Changlang region (Arunachal), south of Guwahati (Assam) and Khasi hills (Meghalaya), Cachar, Mizoram, and Tripura. Formerly Mishmi hills (Arunachal), Garo hills (Meghalaya), Nagaland, and Manipur.

Genus.Name: Dryocopus
Genus.Author: Boie
Genus.OriginalPublicationName: Isis

Species.Author: Horsfield
Species.OriginalPublicationName: Transactions of the Linnean Society of London

Subspecies.Author: Jerdon
Subspecies.OriginalPublicationName: Madras Journal of Literature and Science
Subspecies.Distribution: Three disjunct populations (1) Surat Dangs and Tansa in NW Maharashtra (historical) (2) SE Chhattisgarh, adjoining NE Andhra, and N Telangana (3) W Ghats from SW Maharashtra till about southern tip of W Ghats in Tamil Nadu.
Subspecies.Specimens: BNHS, NHMUK, AMNH, FMNH, MCZ, USNM, YPM, TNHM, LKO
Subspecies.Notes: See Santharam (2003). Reports from Melghat (NC Maharashtra) not investigated.

Species.Author: Blyth
Species.OriginalPublicationName: Journal of the Asiatic Society of Bengal
Species.Distribution: N, Middle, S, and Little Andaman Is. and islets of Interview, Long, Nicholson, Havelock, Tarmuqli, Alexandra, and Rutland Is.
Species.Specimens: BNHS, ZSI, NHMUK

Genus.Name: Microhierax
Genus.Author: Sharpe
Genus.OriginalPublicationName: Catalogue of the birds in the British Museum

Species.Author: Blyth
Species.OriginalPublicationName: Journal of the Asiatic Society of Bengal
Species.Distribution: Lowland Assam east from Manas, adjoining Arunachal, Nagaland, Meghalaya, Cachar, and Mizoram.
Species.Specimens: BNHS, UMMZ, AMNH, FMNH, MCZ, USNM

Species.Author: Linnaeus
Species.Taxonomy: Sometimes considered monotypic.

Subspecies.Author: Linnaeus
Subspecies.OriginalPublicationName: Systema Naturæ per Regna Tria Naturæ, Secundum Classes, Ordines, Genera, Species, cum Characteribus, Differentiis, Synonymis, Locis. Tomus I. Editio decima, reformata
Subspecies.Distribution: Uttarakhand, N Bengal, Sikkim, C Assam till about Kaziranga, Garo hills (Meghalaya), and disjunctly in Similipal hills (Odisha).
Subspecies.Specimens: BNHS, ZSI, UMMZ, FMNH, MCZ, ROM, YPM

Subspecies.Author: Swann
Subspecies.OriginalPublicationName: A synoptical list of the Accipitres (diurnal birds of prey) (etc.)
Subspecies.Distribution: E Manipur hills.
Subspecies.Notes: Recently photographed, and subspecies probably this, on range.

Genus.Name: Falco
Genus.Author: Linnaeus
Genus.OriginalPublicationName: Systema Naturæ per Regna Tria Naturæ, Secundum Classes, Ordines, Genera, Species, cum Characteribus, Differentiis, Synonymis, Locis. Tomus I. Editio decima, reformata
Genus.GenusDesignationPublicationName: , A check list of North American birds, 2nd ed.

Species.Author: Fleischer
Species.OriginalPublicationName: Sylvan, ein Jahrbuch für Forstmänner, Jäger und Jagdfreunde
Species.Taxonomy: Includes _pekinensis_ Swinhoe 1870 – to which the Indian non-breeding population has been previously assigned (Ri1961).
Species.Distribution: Winter: Very locally in select sites near Tal Chhapar (Rajasthan), Velavadar (Gujarat), Lonavla (Maharashtra), Rollapadu (Andhra), Coimbatore (Tamil Nadu), Munnar, (Kerala), and Tirunelveli (Tamil Nadu) – but throughout India during passage.
Species.Specimens: BNHS, UMMZ, ROM, LKO

Subspecies.Author: Linnaeus
Subspecies.OriginalPublicationName: Systema Naturæ per Regna Tria Naturæ, Secundum Classes, Ordines, Genera, Species, cum Characteribus, Differentiis, Synonymis, Locis. Tomus I. Editio decima, reformata
Subspecies.Distribution: Breeding: Kashmir, Himachal, and Uttarakhand (?). Non-breeding: Throughout India, east till W Bengal and south till Kanyakumari including Lakashadweep Is.
Subspecies.Specimens: BNHS, ZSI, UMZC, UMMZ, AMNH, FMNH, MCZ, ROM, USNM, YPM, HYD

Subspecies.Author: McClelland
Subspecies.OriginalPublicationName: Proceedings of the Zoological Society of London
Subspecies.Distribution: Winter: N Bengal, Sikkim, Arunachal, Assam, and all NE hill states as well as Andaman & Nicobar Is. Sporadically in the Indian peninsula up to Coimbatore (Tamil Nadu).
Subspecies.Specimens: BNHS, UMMZ, AMNH, FMNH, MCZ, YPM
Subspecies.Notes: Breeding claims within Indian limits, particularly Sikkim and E Himalaya by Stuart Baker, and followed in Naoroji (2006), not considered definitive here. Andaman & Nicobar Is birds considered this subspecies purely on range.

Subspecies.Author: Baker
Subspecies.OriginalPublicationName: Bulletin of the British Ornithologists' Club
Subspecies.Distribution: W Ghats from about Mumbai till the southern tip as well as SE Ghats till Servarayan hills.
Subspecies.Specimens: BNHS, NHMUK, AMNH, FMNH, MCZ, USNM, YPM

Subspecies.Author: Daudin
Subspecies.OriginalPublicationName: Traité élémentaire et complet d'ornithologie
Subspecies.Distribution: Throughout India from the Himalayan foothills of Jammu, south till Kanyakumari except SW India where it is a straggler; east through Brahmaputra plains in Assam and adjoining Arunachal. Historically at least in Cachar and Manipur.
Subspecies.Specimens: ZSI, UMZC, UMMZ, AMNH, FMNH, MCZ, ROM, YPM

Species.Author: Linnaeus
Species.OriginalPublicationName: Systema Naturæ. Editio duodecima reformata. Tomus I [part 1]
Species.Distribution: Vagrant. Reported only from Gilgit (Historical).
Species.Specimens: NHMUK

Species.Author: Radde
Species.OriginalPublicationName: Reisen im Süden von Ost-Sibirien in den Jahren 1855-1859 (etc.)
Species.Distribution: Autumn passage migrant – concentrating in NE India as well as W Bengal and Sikkim; W India from Gujarat till Kanyakumari. Sporadically also in C India, Deccan, and E coastal plains; vagrant to W Himalaya (Ladakh, Jammu & Kashmir, Himachal, and Uttarakhand). Spring migration is less intense, but across the same range.
Species.Specimens: UMMZ, AMNH, FMNH

Species.Author: Linnaeus
Species.OriginalPublicationName: Systema Naturæ per Regna Tria Naturæ, Secundum Classes, Ordines, Genera, Species, cum Characteribus, Differentiis, Synonymis, Locis. Tomus I. Editio decima, reformata

Subspecies.Author: Tunstall
Subspecies.OriginalPublicationName: Ornithologia Britannica: seu avium omnium Britannicarum tam terrestrium, quam aquaticarum catalogus (etc.)
Subspecies.Distribution: NW India.
Subspecies.Notes: See Ganpule & Bhatt (2014) for a discussion on the possibility of _aesalon_ subspecies in India.

Subspecies.Author: Clark
Subspecies.OriginalPublicationName: Proceedings of the United States National Museum
Subspecies.Distribution: Vagrant. Reported from Gilgit, Gujarat (?), and Sikkim (?).
Subspecies.Notes: Insufficiently documented, none recently from Gujarat. Included here based on the specimens (NHMUK#1885.8.19.2497-2498) from Gilgit (AR2001).

Subspecies.Author: Sushkin
Subspecies.OriginalPublicationName: Bulletin of the British Ornithologists' Club
Subspecies.Distribution: Gujarat and possibly most birds reported from Rajasthan and Delhi region. Also, Gilgit (?) and Ladakh.
Subspecies.Notes: See Ganpule & Bhatt (2014) for details. Ladakh range based on NHMUK#1965.M.1509. Gilgit specimen mentioned in AR2001 could not be located in NHMUK.

Subspecies.Author: Linnaeus
Subspecies.OriginalPublicationName: Systema Naturæ per Regna Tria Naturæ, Secundum Classes, Ordines, Genera, Species, cum Characteribus, Differentiis, Synonymis, Locis. Tomus I. Editio decima, reformata
Subspecies.Taxonomy: Includes here _centralasiae_ Butulin 1911, which was once considered the breeding form in the Himalaya (AR2001).
Subspecies.Distribution: Breeding: W Himalaya – Gilgit, Kashmir, Ladakh, Himachal, and Uttarakhand. Non-breeding: Throughout India including Assam, Arunachal, and all NE hill states at least during migration – sporadic in E coastal plains and S India.
Subspecies.Specimens: BNHS, UMMZ, AMNH, FMNH, YPM, TNHM

Species.Author: Horsfield
Species.OriginalPublicationName: Transactions of the Linnean Society of London
Species.Taxonomy: Includes _rufipedoides_ Hodgson 1844 with type locality restricted to Nepal by Baker 1927; supposed to be the subspecies that occurs along the Himalaya towards the western part of its range and possibly the erstwhile wintering population of SW India.
Species.Distribution: Sikkim and N Bengal east through Assam, adjoining Arunachal, Nagaland, Meghalaya, Cachar, Manipur, Mizoram, and Tripura. Historically, breeding west till Uttarakhand and wintering in SW India.
Species.Specimens: BNHS, NHMUK, UMMZ, AMNH, MCZ, USNM, TNHM, LKO

Species.Author: Gray
Species.OriginalPublicationName: Illustrations of Indian zoology; chiefly selected from the collection of Major-General Hardwicke, F. R. S.
Species.Distribution: Historically, throughout India till W Assam but presently restricted to NW India of Rajasthan and Gujarat; Uttarakhand and intervening areas in N India, W Maharashtra till NW Karnataka, Deccan regions of E Karnataka and W Telangana, and sparingly further south and east.
Species.Specimens: BNHS, ZSI, UMZC, UMMZ, AMNH, FMNH, MCZ, ROM, USNM, YPM, TNHM, LKO

Subspecies.Author: Gray
Subspecies.OriginalPublicationName: Illustrations of Indian zoology; chiefly selected from the collection of Major-General Hardwicke, F. R. S.
Subspecies.Distribution: Winter: W Rajasthan and W India.

Subspecies.Author: Jerdon
Subspecies.OriginalPublicationName: Ibis
Subspecies.Taxonomy: Wink _et al._ 1998 suggested species status for the eastern group of Saker known as 'Shanghar Falcon'.
Subspecies.Distribution: Ladakh (also breeding) – sporadically to N Sikkim and N Bengal.
Subspecies.Notes: N Sikkim and N Bengal could be _hendersoni_ Hume, 1871 as well – but belong to the E Saker group.

Species.Author: Tunstall
Species.OriginalPublicationName: Ornithologia Britannica: seu avium omnium Britannicarum tam terrestrium, quam aquaticarum catalogus (etc.)

Subspecies.Author: Latham
Subspecies.OriginalPublicationName: Index ornithologicus, sive systema ornithologiæ; complectens avium divisionem in classes, ordines, genera, species, ipsarumque varietates: adjectis synonymis, locis, descriptionibus, &c.
Subspecies.Taxonomy: Formerly, the wintering form was considered as _japonensis_ (Ri1982); but now all authorities consider it as this subspecies.
Subspecies.Distribution: Winter: Throughout India including Andaman Is.
Subspecies.Specimens: BNHS, UMMZ, AMNH, FMNH, YPM, TNHM

Subspecies.Author: Temminck
Subspecies.OriginalPublicationName: Nouveau recueil de planches coloriées d'oiseaux, pour servir de suite et de complément aux planches enluminées de Buffon
Subspecies.Taxonomy: Wink (2000), Fuchs _et al._ (2015) found support for treating _pelegrinoides_ as a separate species but also see Wink _et al._ (2010), White _et al._ (2013).
Subspecies.Distribution: Gujarat and NW India.
Subspecies.Notes: Bhatt & Ganpule (2017) concluded there are no definitive reports of _pelegrinoides_ though some birds nearing its plumage have occurred.

Subspecies.Author: Sclater
Subspecies.OriginalPublicationName: Ibis
Subspecies.Taxonomy: When _F. pelegrinoides_ is recognised as a species (RA 2012), _babylonicus_ is listed as its subspecies.
Subspecies.Distribution: Winter: Kachchh, Rajasthan and sporadically elsewhere in peninsular India – from a region bounded by Kashmir and Ladakh in the north, Bankura (Bengal) in the east, and Belagavi (NW Karnataka) in the south.
Subspecies.Notes: See Bhatt & Ganpule (2017).

Subspecies.Author: Sundevall
Subspecies.OriginalPublicationName: Physiographiska Sällskapets Tidskrift
Subspecies.Taxonomy: RA2012 suggests that the northern and southern populations of this subspecies are disjunct and may be separated as two independent subspecies. More work required but certainly the Himalayan breeding population appear to be disjunct.
Subspecies.Distribution: W Himalaya from Kashmir, Ladakh, Himachal, and Uttarakhand; C Indian highlands and west till Mt. Abu, NE Ghats; W Ghats from Surat Dangs till S Tamil Nadu, SE Ghats as well as hillocks in the Deccan; sporadic in NE (e.g., Garo hills, W Arunachal).
Subspecies.Specimens: BNHS, ZSI, UMMZ, AMNH, FMNH, TNHM

Subspecies.Author: Sharpe
Subspecies.OriginalPublicationName: Ibis
Subspecies.Distribution: NE India.
Subspecies.Notes: A possible intergrade with Shaheen reported from Mishmi hills – identification not conclusive.

Genus.Name: Psittacula
Genus.Author: Cuvier
Genus.OriginalPublicationName: Leçons d'anatomie comparée
Genus.GenusDesignationPublicationName: , The birds of Australia

Subspecies.Author: Hodgson
Subspecies.OriginalPublicationName: Asiatic Researches; or, Transactions of the Society instituted in Bengal, for enquiring into the history, the antiquities, the arts and sciences, and literature of Asia
Subspecies.Taxonomy: Includes _indoburmanicus_ Hume 1878 from Sikkim.
Subspecies.Distribution: Kashmir, Jammu, along the Himalayan foothills through Himachal, Uttarakhand, N Uttar Pradesh and Bihar, W Bengal, Sikkim and Brahmaputra plains of Assam and adjoining Arunachal and Nagaland, extending west through E Rajasthan, Gujarat, C India, and NE Ghats of Andhra and Odisha.
Subspecies.Specimens: BNHS, ZSI, UMZC, UMMZ, AMNH, FMNH, MCZ, ROM, YPM

Subspecies.Author: Linnaeus
Subspecies.OriginalPublicationName: Systema Naturæ. Editio duodecima reformata. Tomus I [part 1]
Subspecies.Distribution: Mumbai region south through Goa, Karnataka along the outer edge of W Ghats as well as SE Ghats in the Deccan extending to Nallamala hills.
Subspecies.Notes: 18°N kept as the northern limit for this population (AR2001). It has also been suggested that the populations of this species in western India may have been established by cage escapees (RA2012).

Subspecies.Author: Ball
Subspecies.OriginalPublicationName: Journal of the Asiatic Society of Bengal
Subspecies.Distribution: N, Middle, S, and Little Andaman Is., Narcondam and Barren Is., also islets of North Reef, Interview, Long, Havelock, Neil, Ross, Tarmugli, Alexandra, Red skin, Boat, South Sentinel, and Rutland Is.

Subspecies.Author: Kloss
Subspecies.OriginalPublicationName: The Journal of the Natural History Society of Siam
Subspecies.Distribution: Cachar.
Subspecies.Notes: Reports from Nagaland, Manipur, and Mizoram not evaluated.

Species.Author: Scopoli
Species.OriginalPublicationName: Annus I Historico-naturalis. Descriptiones avium musei proprii earumque rariorum, quas vidit in vivario Augustiss. Imperatorus, et museo excell. Comitis Francisci Annib. Turriani

Subspecies.Author: Neumann
Subspecies.OriginalPublicationName: Ornithologische Monatsberichte
Subspecies.Taxonomy: Includes _fragosa_ Koelz 1954 from Anadra, Sirohi, Rajasthan.
Subspecies.Distribution: Kashmir south through the subcontinent about the latitude of Mumbai; east into Assam, adjoining Arunachal as well as NE hill states.
Subspecies.Specimens: BNHS, ZSI, UMZC, UMMZ, AMNH, FMNH, MCZ, ROM, YPM

Subspecies.Author: Bechstein
Subspecies.OriginalPublicationName: Naturgeschichte der Stubenthiere oder Anleitung zur Kentniss und Wartung derjenigen Thiere, welche man in der Stube halten kann: 1. Band. Die Stubenvögel. Zweite vermehrte und verbesserte Auflage
Subspecies.Distribution: Throughout southern peninsula below the latitude of Mumbai; Lakshadweep Is.
Subspecies.Specimens: BNHS, ZSI, UMZC, UMMZ, AMNH, FMNH, MCZ, ROM, USNM, YPM, TNHM, HYD
Subspecies.Notes: 20°N kept as the northern limit for this population (AR2001).

Species.Author: Lesson
Species.OriginalPublicationName: Voyage aux Indes Orientales par le Nord de l'Europe, les provinces du Caucase, la Géorgie, l'Arménie et la Perse (etc.). Zoologie
Species.Taxonomy: Rothschild's or Intermediate Parakeet _P. intermedia_ Rothschild 1895 (HB#561) now considered invalid and the specimens were of hybrid origin; specifically _P. himalayana_ x _P. cyanocephala_ and _P. krameri_ x _P. cyanocephala_ (Rasmussen & Collar 1999).
Species.Distribution: W Himalaya from Kashmir all the way till Uttarakhand; and in Sikkim and N Bengal as well.
Species.Specimens: BNHS, NHMUK, UMMZ, AMNH, FMNH, USNM, YPM, LKO

Species.Author: Hume
Species.OriginalPublicationName: Stray Feathers
Species.Distribution: Historically from N Bengal east through Assam and NE hill states; presently restricted to E Arunachal, adjoining Assam, Nagaland, Cachar, Manipur, and Mizoram.
Species.Specimens: UMZC, UMMZ, AMNH, FMNH, YPM

Species.Author: Linnaeus
Species.OriginalPublicationName: Systema Naturæ. Editio duodecima reformata. Tomus I [part 1]
Species.Taxonomy: N Indian _bengalensis_ Foster 1781 (Type locality: Kolkata) sometimes recognised. Includes _rosa_ Boddaert 1783 from Mahe – restricted to Malabar coast.
Species.Distribution: Throughout Indian peninsula from Kashmir through the Himalayan ranges till Uttarakhand, N and NW India excluding the Thar, hills of W, and C India, east till Sikkim and W Bengal, hills of S India including W Ghats and the adjoining midlands, SE Ghats and Deccan hillocks. Sporadic in Deccan plateau and E coastal plains.
Species.Specimens: BNHS, ZSI, UMZC, UMMZ, AMNH, FMNH, MCZ, ROM, USNM, TNHM, HYD, LKO

Subspecies.Author: Biswas
Subspecies.OriginalPublicationName: American Museum Novitates
Subspecies.Taxonomy: Though Tripura birds trend towards _juneae_ (Biswas 1951), true _juneae_ do not occur within our limits.
Subspecies.Distribution: N Bengal, Sikkim, through Assam, adjoining Arunachal, Nagaland, Meghalaya, Cachar, Manipur, and Tripura.
Subspecies.Notes: Mizoram records not evaluated.

Species.Author: Vigors
Species.OriginalPublicationName: The Zoological Journal
Species.Distribution: W Ghats, including the midlands, from south of Tansa (NW Maharashtra) till the southern tip of the W Ghats in Kanyakumari district (Tamil Nadu). Also, SE Ghats reaching almost till Bengaluru as well as Severayan, Kolli, and Sirumalai hills and the eastern slopes of W Ghats in Karnataka.
Species.Specimens: BNHS, ZSI, UMZC, UMMZ, AMNH, FMNH, ROM, USNM, YPM, TNHM, LKO

Species.Author: Fraser
Species.OriginalPublicationName: Proceedings of the Zoological Society of London
Species.Distribution: Restricted to Walong region (Arunachal).

Species.Author: Linnaeus
Species.OriginalPublicationName: Systema Naturæ per Regna Tria Naturæ, Secundum Classes, Ordines, Genera, Species, cum Characteribus, Differentiis, Synonymis, Locis. Tomus I. Editio decima, reformata

Subspecies.Author: Müller
Subspecies.OriginalPublicationName: Des Ritters Carl von Linné ... vollständigen Natursystems Supplements- und Register-Band über alle sechs Theile oder Classen des Thierreichs
Subspecies.Distribution: Uttarakhand, W Bengal, Sikkim, Assam, Arunachal, as well as all the NE hill states.
Subspecies.Specimens: BNHS, ZSI, UMMZ, AMNH, FMNH, ROM, YPM, LKO
Subspecies.Notes: Introduced or even naturalised populations exist in several large cities including Ahmedabad, Mumbai, Pune, Hyderabad, and Bengaluru.

Subspecies.Author: Oberholser
Subspecies.OriginalPublicationName: Proceedings of the Biological Society of Washington
Subspecies.Distribution: N, Middle, S, and Little Andaman as well as all islets including North Reef, Interview, Long, Inglis, Henry Lawrence, Havelock, Neil, Ross, Alexandra, Jolly Buoy, and Rutland Is.

Species.Author: Blyth
Species.OriginalPublicationName: Journal of the Asiatic Society of Bengal
Species.Taxonomy: ZSI#35470 also listed as Holotype in ZSI register.
Species.Distribution: S Nicobar Is group including Great Nicobar, Little Nicobar, Menchal, and Kondul Is.
Species.Specimens: BNHS, ZSI, NHMUK, MCZ, USNM

Species.Author: Boddaert
Species.OriginalPublicationName: Table des planches enluminéez d'histoire naturelle de M. D'Aubenton

Subspecies.Author: Hume
Subspecies.OriginalPublicationName: Stray Feathers
Subspecies.Distribution: N, Middle, S, and Little Andaman Is., Narcondam and Barren Is. as well as all islets including Paget, North Reef, Interview, Long, Inglis, Henry Lawrence, Havelock, Neil, Ross, Tarmugli, Alexandra, Boat, and Rutland Is.

Subspecies.Author: Gould
Subspecies.OriginalPublicationName: The birds of Asia
Subspecies.Distribution: Car Nicobar Is., C Nicobar group (Tillonchong, Teresa, Kamorta, Trinket, Nancowrry, and Katchal Is), and S Nicobar group (Meroe, Treis, and Great Nicobar Is.).

Genus.Name: Loriculus
Genus.Author: Blyth
Genus.OriginalPublicationName: Journal of the Asiatic Society of Bengal
Genus.GenusDesignationPublicationName: , Catalogue of the genera and subgenera of birds contained in the British Museum

Subspecies.Author: Sparrman
Subspecies.OriginalPublicationName: Museum Carlsonianum, in quo novas et selectas aves, coloribus ad vivum brevique descriptione illustratas (etc.)
Subspecies.Taxonomy: Includes _rubropygius_ Baker 1926 of W Ghats (Type locality Belagavi [=Belgaum] district). Andaman birds may represent an undescribed subspecies.
Subspecies.Distribution: Occurs as four disjunct populations. (1) Sikkim, N Bengal through Assam, adjoining Arunachal, Nagaland, Meghalaya, Cachar, Manipur, Mizoram, and Tripura. (2) NE Ghats of Odisha, NE Andhra, and Chhattisgarh extending to E Maharashtra. (3) W India from Mumbai south till Kanyakumari, extending along SE Ghats to Sirumalai, Servarayan, and Biligirirangan till Melagiri. (4) Andaman Is. – all major islands and islets. Sporadic elsewhere.
Subspecies.Notes: Movements not completely worked out.

Genus.Name: Psarisomus
Genus.Author: Swainson
Genus.OriginalPublicationName: On the natural history and classification of birds

Subspecies.Author: Jameson
Subspecies.OriginalPublicationName: The Edinburgh New Philosophical Journal
Subspecies.Distribution: Kashmir (Mirpur), Himachal (Shimla region), Uttarakhand, N Bengal, Sikkim, Assam, Arunachal, Nagaland, Meghalaya, Cachar, Manipur, and Mizoram.
Subspecies.Specimens: BNHS, ZSI, UMMZ, FMNH, MCZ, ROM, USNM, YPM

Genus.Name: Serilophus
Genus.Author: Swainson
Genus.OriginalPublicationName: On the natural history and classification of birds

Species.Author: Hodgson
Species.AlternativeNames: Collared Broadbill, Silver-breasted Broadbill (incl. _S. lunatus_ EL)
Species.OriginalPublicationName: Journal of the Asiatic Society of Bengal
Species.Taxonomy: Previously lumped with extalimital _S. lunatus_ (Gould 1834).
Species.Distribution: Extreme eastern end. of N Bengal (at least historical), Assam, adjoining Arunachal, Nagaland, Meghalaya, Manipur, Mizoram, and Tripura.
Species.Specimens: BNHS, ZSI, UMMZ, AMNH, FMNH, MCZ, ROM, USNM, YPM

Genus.Name: Hydrornis
Genus.Author: Blyth
Genus.OriginalPublicationName: Journal of the Asiatic Society of Bengal

Subspecies.Author: Hodgson
Subspecies.OriginalPublicationName: Journal of the Asiatic Society of Bengal
Subspecies.Distribution: N, Bengal, Sikkim, Assam, Arunachal, Nagaland, Meghalaya, Cachar, Manipur, Mizoram, and Tripura.

Subspecies.Author: Blyth
Subspecies.OriginalPublicationName: Journal of the Asiatic Society of Bengal
Subspecies.Distribution: Cachar, Manipur, Mizoram, and Tripura.
Subspecies.Notes: Reports from Arunachal and Nagaland in AR2001 not evaluated.

Genus.Name: Pitta
Genus.Author: Vieillot
Genus.OriginalPublicationName: Analyse d'une Nouvelle Ornithologie Élémentaire

Species.Author: Linnaeus
Species.OriginalPublicationName: Systema Naturæ. Editio duodecima reformata. Tomus I [part 1]
Species.Taxonomy: Includes _pulchra_ Koelz 1939 from Bhadwar, Kangra, Himachal.
Species.Distribution: Breeding: Sub-Himalayan foothills from Kashmir, Jammu, east through Himachal, Uttarakhand, N Uttar Pradesh, W Bengal; hills of C India from W Rajasthan, E and S Gujarat, Madhya Pradesh, Chhattisgarh, E Maharashtra, Jharkhand, Odisha, NE Ghats of Andhra and Telangana; along the W Ghats from Surat Dangs, W Maharashtra till about Goa and NW Karnataka. Non-breeding: Throughout the peninsular India from Maharashtra, down till the tip of the peninsula as well as Lakshadweep. Straggler to NE India.
Species.Specimens: BNHS, ZSI, UMZC, UMMZ, AMNH, FMNH, MCZ, ROM, USNM, YPM, TNHM, HYD, LKO

Species.Author: Müller
Species.OriginalPublicationName: Des Ritters Carl von Linné ... vollständigen Natursystems Supplements- und Register-Band über alle sechs Theile oder Classen des Thierreichs
Species.Distribution: Vagrant. Reported only from Narcondam Is.

Species.Author: Richmond
Species.OriginalPublicationName: Proceedings of the United States National Museum
Species.Taxonomy: Previously lumped with _P. sordida_ (Müller 1776) and somtimes continues to be treated under that species (HBW/BLI).
Species.Distribution: Great and Little Nicobar Is.
Species.Specimens: BNHS, ZSI, NHMUK, USNM

Species.Author: Müller
Species.OriginalPublicationName: Des Ritters Carl von Linné ... vollständigen Natursystems Supplements- und Register-Band über alle sechs Theile oder Classen des Thierreichs

Subspecies.Author: Hartlaub
Subspecies.OriginalPublicationName: Revue Zoologique, par la Société Cuvierienne
Subspecies.Distribution: Breeding: W Himachal, adjoining Haryana, Uttarakhand and N Uttar Pradesh. Non-breeding: N Bihar, N Bengal, Sikkim, Assam, Arunachal, Nagaland, Meghalaya, Cachar, Mizoram, Tripura, and Narcondam Is. (straggler).
Subspecies.Specimens: BNHS, ZSI, NHMUK, UMMZ, AMNH, FMNH, MCZ, YPM

Species.Author: Schlegel
Species.OriginalPublicationName: De vogels van Nederlandsch Indië
Species.Distribution: Reported only from Sundarbans (W Bengal) and Bhitarkanika (Odisha).

Genus.Name: Pericrocotus
Genus.Author: Boie
Genus.OriginalPublicationName: Isis

Species.Author: Jerdon
Species.OriginalPublicationName: Madras Journal of Literature and Science
Species.Distribution: Punjab (local?), Delhi region, E Rajasthan, Madhya Pradesh, Gujarat, Maharashtra, NE Karnataka, and Telangana – sporadically further east in Uttar Pradesh, Bihar, Jharkhand and Odisha. Disjunctly in the Deccan of S Karnataka, and NW Tamil Nadu at the base of the Nilgiris.
Species.Specimens: BNHS, NHMUK, UMMZ, AMNH, FMNH, HYD

Subspecies.Author: Linnaeus
Subspecies.OriginalPublicationName: Systema Naturæ. Editio duodecima reformata. Tomus I [part 1]
Subspecies.Taxonomy: Includes _iredalei_ Baker 1929 from Ambala, Haryana and _galbinus_ Van Tyne & Koelz 1936 from Kangra, Himachal.
Subspecies.Distribution: Gangetic plains of Haryana, Uttarakhand, Uttar Pradesh, W Bengal, and NC India.
Subspecies.Specimens: BNHS, NHMUK, UMMZ, AMNH, FMNH, MCZ, ROM, USNM, YPM, MYS, HYD

Subspecies.Author: Baker
Subspecies.OriginalPublicationName: Bulletin of the British Ornithologists' Club
Subspecies.Distribution: Sub-Himalayan tracts of Jammu, Himachal, Punjab, W Haryana, W Rajasthan, and Kachchh.
Subspecies.Notes: Not always possible to assign subspecies – occurs in Punjab and Meerut, Uttar Pradesh while intervening specimens in Haryana are of _peregrinus_ (see Abdulali 1981).

Subspecies.Author: Gmelin
Subspecies.OriginalPublicationName: Systema Naturae. Editio decima tertia, aucta, reformata. Cura Jo. Frid. Gmelin (etc.). Tomus I. Pars II
Subspecies.Distribution: SW India from about Goa south through coastal Karnataka and Kerala.
Subspecies.Specimens: BNHS, NHMUK, UMMZ, AMNH, FMNH, MCZ, USNM, YPM

Subspecies.Author: Linnaeus
Subspecies.OriginalPublicationName: Systema Naturæ. Editio duodecima reformata. Tomus I [part 1]
Subspecies.Taxonomy: Includes _sidhoutnsis_ Koelz 1939 from Sidhout, Kadapa, Andhra Pradesh and _dharmakumari_ Koelz 1950 from Jamvala, Junagadh, Gujarat.
Subspecies.Distribution: Saurashtra (Gujarat), S Rajasthan, Madhya Pradesh, S Odisha, Chhattisgarh and further south through the peninsula in Karnataka, Telangana, Andhra, and Tamil Nadu.
Subspecies.Specimens: BNHS, ZSI, NHMUK, AMNH, FMNH, ROM, USNM

Subspecies.Author: Baker
Subspecies.OriginalPublicationName: Bulletin of the British Ornithologists' Club
Subspecies.Taxonomy: Sometimes, this subspecies is included under _thai_ Deignan 1947 (see RA2012). Even if the populations are synonymised, _thai_ should only be a junior synonym of _vividus_. Andaman birds included here, but may merit subspecies separation as _osmastoni_ Roselaar & Prins 2000 (see Abdulali 1981).
Subspecies.Distribution: E Bihar, W Bengal, Odisha, extreme NE Andhra, Sikkim, N Bengal, Assam, Nagaland, Cachar, Manipur, and Tripura. Disjunctly in N, Middle, S, and Little Andaman Is. as well as the islets of Interview, Long, Inglis, Havelock, Neil, Ross, Tarmugli, Boat, Red Skin, Jolly Buoy, N Cinque, and S Cinque Is.
Subspecies.Specimens: BNHS, ZSI, NHMUK, UMMZ, FMNH, MCZ, ROM, USNM, YPM

Subspecies.Author: Blyth
Subspecies.OriginalPublicationName: Journal of the Asiatic Society of Bengal
Subspecies.Distribution: N Bengal, Sikkim, Assam, Arunachal, Nagaland, Meghalaya, Cachar, Manipur, and Mizoram.
Subspecies.Specimens: BNHS, ZSI, NHMUK, UMMZ, AMNH, FMNH, MCZ, YPM

Subspecies.Author: Vigors
Subspecies.OriginalPublicationName: Proceedings of the Committee of Science and Correspondence of the Zoological Society of London
Subspecies.Taxonomy: Includes _affinis_ McClelland 1840 from Sadiya, Assam and _sanguineus_ Koelz 1952 from Shillong Peak, Khasi hills, Meghalaya (see AR2001).
Subspecies.Distribution: Uttarakhand (straggler), N Bengal, Sikkim, W and C Assam, W and C Arunachal, and all NE hill states.
Subspecies.Specimens: BNHS, ZSI, NHMUK, UMMZ, FMNH, MCZ, USNM, YPM, GMC

Subspecies.Author: McClelland
Subspecies.OriginalPublicationName: Proceedings of the Zoological Society of London
Subspecies.Distribution: E Assam and E Arunachal.

Subspecies.Author: Bangs & Phillips
Subspecies.OriginalPublicationName: Bulletin of the Museum of Comparative Zoology
Subspecies.Distribution: Breeding: W Himalaya from Gilgit, Kashmir, Jammu, Himachal, and Uttarakhand. Non-breeding: Adjoining foothills as well as sporadically in Indo-Gangetic plains of Punjab, Haryana and Uttar Pradesh; C India (Madhya Pradesh and NE Maharashtra) as well as E Rajasthan straggling to NE Gujarat (Deesa).
Subspecies.Specimens: BNHS, NHMUK, UMMZ, AMNH, FMNH, MCZ, ROM, USNM, YPM

Subspecies.Author: Mayr
Subspecies.OriginalPublicationName: Ibis
Subspecies.Distribution: N Bengal, Sikkim, Assam, Arunachal, and Meghalaya.

Subspecies.Author: Bangs & Phillips
Subspecies.OriginalPublicationName: Bulletin of the Museum of Comparative Zoology
Subspecies.Distribution: E Assam and E Arunachal.
Subspecies.Notes: In the absence of validated specimens, presence of the nominate subspecies in NE India is hypothetical. Listing this for 'NE Assam' in NHMUK may be following older taxonomy (see RA2012).

Subspecies.Author: Ripley
Subspecies.OriginalPublicationName: Journal of the Bombay Natural History Society
Subspecies.Taxonomy: Includes _aureus_ Koelz 1952 of Mizo hills.
Subspecies.Distribution: Nagaland, Cachar, Manipur, Mizoram, and Tripura.

Species.Author: Forster
Species.OriginalPublicationName: Indische Zoologie oder systematischer Beschreibungen seltener und unbekannter Thiere aus Indien (etc.)
Species.Distribution: Surat Dangs, adjoining W Satpura, along the W Ghats and adjoining midlands till the southern tip in Kanyakumari district; extends east along the SE Ghats till about Jawadhu hills (possibly till Vellore), also into the hilly extensions in C Tamil Nadu like Kolli hills, Sirumalai, and Varusanadu hills.
Species.Specimens: BNHS, NHMUK, UMMZ, AMNH, FMNH, MCZ, ROM, USNM, YPM, TNHM, MYS, LKO

Species.Author: Latham
Species.Taxonomy: All taxa under this sometimes treated as a subspecies of _P. flammeus_ (HBW/BLI).

Subspecies.Author: Latham
Subspecies.OriginalPublicationName: Index ornithologicus, sive systema ornithologiæ; complectens avium divisionem in classes, ordines, genera, species, ipsarumque varietates: adjectis synonymis, locis, descriptionibus, &c.
Subspecies.Taxonomy: Includes _elegans_ Horsfield 1840 from the neighbourhood of Sadiya, E Assam.
Subspecies.Distribution: Himachal, Uttarakhand, N Uttar Pradesh, N Bengal, Sikkim, Assam, and Arunachal.
Subspecies.Specimens: BNHS, ZSI, NHMUK, UMMZ, AMNH, FMNH, MCZ, ROM, USNM, YPM

Subspecies.Author: Whistler & Kinnear
Subspecies.OriginalPublicationName: Journal of the Bombay Natural History Society
Subspecies.Distribution: S W Bengal, Jharkhand, Odisha, Chhattisgarh, E Madhya Pradesh, NE Maharashtra, and NE Andhra till about Nallamala in CE Ghats.

Subspecies.Author: Beavan
Subspecies.OriginalPublicationName: Ibis
Subspecies.Distribution: N, Middle, S and Little Andaman Is. as well as islets of Interview, Long, Outram, Henry Lawrence, Havelock, Neil, Tarmugli, Alexandra, Boat, and Rutland Is.

Subspecies.Author: Swinhoe
Subspecies.OriginalPublicationName: Ibis
Subspecies.Distribution: Nagaland, Meghalaya, Cachar, Manipur, Mizoram, and Tripura as well as adjoining Assam.
Subspecies.Specimens: BNHS, ZSI, NHMUK, UMMZ, FMNH, USNM, YPM

Species.Author: Raffles
Species.OriginalPublicationName: Transactions of the Linnean Society of London
Species.Distribution: Winter: Andaman & Nicobar Is, Chennai region, sporadically elsewhere in S, E and NE India till about Mumbai region in W India.
Species.Specimens: BNHS

Species.Author: Swinhoe
Species.OriginalPublicationName: Ibis
Species.Distribution: Winter: Reported across the country from Assam, West Bengal, Odisha, Gujarat, Maharashtra, Telangana, Andhra, Karnataka, Tamil Nadu. and Andaman Is.

Species.Author: Vieillot
Species.OriginalPublicationName: Nouveau dictionnaire d'histoire naturelle, appliquée aux arts, à l'agriculture, à l'économie rurale et domestique, à la médecine, etc. Nouvelle édition
Species.Distribution: Breeding: Kashmir, Himachal, Uttarakhand, N Bengal, Sikkim, Assam, Arunachal, and all NE hill states; disjunctly in NE Ghats of Odisha and NE Andhra. Non-breeding: Spreads to foothills in NE India and E peninsula, sporadically in the peninsula from Delhi region, Madhya Pradesh, Surat Dangs and Mumbai region, Goa, and NW Karnataka.
Species.Specimens: BNHS, NHMUK, FMNH, MCZ, YPM

Genus.Name: Coracina
Genus.Author: Vieillot
Genus.OriginalPublicationName: Analyse d'une Nouvelle Ornithologie Élémentaire
Genus.GenusDesignationPublicationName: , Museum Heineanum. Verzeichniss der orithologischen Sammlung des Oberamtmann Ferdinand Heine

Subspecies.Author: Lesson
Subspecies.OriginalPublicationName: Traité d'Ornithologie, ou Tableau Méthodique des ordres, sous-ordres, familles, tribus, genres, sous-genres et races d'oiseaux
Subspecies.Taxonomy: Sometimes considered a full species along with _layardi_ Blyth 1866 of Sri Lanka (see RA2012).
Subspecies.Distribution: Throughout India from about Delhi region south through the Gangetic plains roughly south of Ganga river till W Bengal, E Rajasthan, Gujarat excluding Kachchh, C India, W Ghats, E Ghats, and associated hillocks, locally in Deccan.
Subspecies.Specimens: BNHS, ZSI, NHMUK, UMMZ, AMNH, FMNH, MCZ, ROM, USNM, YPM, MYS, HYD

Subspecies.Author: Hodgson
Subspecies.OriginalPublicationName: The India Review and Journal of Foreign Science and the Arts
Subspecies.Taxonomy: Includes _lushaiensis_ Koelz 1954 from Sangau, Mizoram but subspecies assignment of Mizoram (and Manipur) birds tentative, as suggested in RA2012; affinity to extralimital _siamensis_ Baker 1918 to be investigated.
Subspecies.Distribution: Along the Himalayan foothills from Jammu, through Himachal, Uttarakhand, terai region of N Uttar Pradesh and N Bihar, N Bengal, Sikkim, Assam, Arunachal, and all NE hill states.
Subspecies.Specimens: BNHS, ZSI, NHMUK, UMMZ, FMNH, ROM, USNM, YPM, LKO

Subspecies.Author: Neumann
Subspecies.OriginalPublicationName: Ornithologische Monatsberichte
Subspecies.Taxonomy: Includes _andamanensis_ Whistler 1940 from S Andamans.
Subspecies.Distribution: N, Middle, S, and Little Andaman Is as well as the islets of Interview, Long, Outram, Havelock, Neil, Tarmugli, Red Skin, and Rutland Is.

Species.Author: Ball
Species.OriginalPublicationName: Journal of the Asiatic Society of Bengal
Species.Distribution: N, Middle, S and Little Andaman Is. as well as islets of Interview, Havelock, and Neil Is.
Species.Specimens: BNHS, NHMUK

Genus.Name: Lalage
Genus.Author: Boie
Genus.OriginalPublicationName: Isis

Species.Author: Forster
Species.OriginalPublicationName: Indische Zoologie oder systematischer Beschreibungen seltener und unbekannter Thiere aus Indien (etc.)

Subspecies.Author: Kloss
Subspecies.OriginalPublicationName: Journal of the Malayan Branch of the Royal Asiatic Society
Subspecies.Taxonomy: Nomenclature complicated. Both historical names _Campephaga terat_ and _Turdus niger_ Foster 1781 for this population are invalid. Baker (1923) restricted the type locality to the nominate subspecies to Nicobars only to be over-ruled by Kloss (1926) who moved it to Singapore and gave a new name for the birds of Kamorta, Nicobars.
Subspecies.Distribution: C Nicobar Is. – Teresa, Trinket, Nancowry, Kamorta, and Katchal Is.
Subspecies.Notes: Sight report from Little Andaman Is. likely to be correct, but not evaluated here – old Andaman specimens were misidentified Ashy Minivet _P. divaricatus_ (RA2012).

Subspecies.Author: Hodgson
Subspecies.OriginalPublicationName: The India Review and Journal of Foreign Science and the Arts
Subspecies.Taxonomy: Birds of E Arunachal and NE hill states show consistent plumage variations (RA2012); more study needed to see if a subspecies status is warranted.
Subspecies.Distribution: Breeding: Jammu (sporadic), Himachal, Uttarakhand, N Bengal, Sikkim, Arunachal, Assam, and all NE hill states. Non-breeding: Extends to adjacent plains and C Indian highlands, S W Bengal, Chota Nagpur plateau of Jharkhand, N Odisha, NE Ghats of Odisha, NE Andhra, and Chhattisgarh, sporadically further south and east reaching E Gujarat, Telangana, Goa, as far south as Bengaluru (SE Karnataka) and Chennai (NE Tamil Nadu).
Subspecies.Specimens: BNHS, ZSI, UMMZ, AMNH, FMNH, YPM, LKO

Subspecies.Author: Rüppell
Subspecies.OriginalPublicationName: Museum Senckenbergianum: Abhandlungen aus dem Gebiete der beschreibenden Naturgeschichte
Subspecies.Taxonomy: Localised subspecies; Jammu birds assumed to belong to this subspecies. Includes _eximia_ Van Tyne & Koelz 1936 from Bhadwar, Kangra, Himachal.
Subspecies.Distribution: Jammu, S Himachal and adjoining Punjab, Haryana, and Uttarakhand.
Subspecies.Notes: Exact southeastern limits of this subspecies unknown; tentatively assumed to intergrade with _sykesi_ in Uttarakhand.

Subspecies.Author: Strickland
Subspecies.OriginalPublicationName: The Annals and Magazine of Natural History including Zoology, Botany, and Geology
Subspecies.Distribution: Throughout the subcontinent – from about Delhi region, E Rajasthan, Gujarat, Gangetic plains, C India, W Bengal (incl. N Bengal), Tripura, entire southern peninsula including Ghats, and Deccan.
Subspecies.Specimens: BNHS, ZSI, NHMUK, UMMZ, AMNH, FMNH, MCZ, YPM, TNHM, MYS, HYD
Subspecies.Notes: Presence in NE India (AR2001), except Tripura, required confirmation.

Genus.Name: Pteruthius
Genus.Author: Swainson
Genus.OriginalPublicationName: Fauna Boreali-Americana; or the zoology of the northern parts of British America: containing descriptions of the objects of natural history collected on the late northern land expeditions under command of Captain Sir John Franklin, R.N. Part second, the birds

Species.Author: Blyth
Species.OriginalPublicationName: Journal of the Asiatic Society of Bengal
Species.Distribution: N Bengal, Sikkim, Arunachal, Nagaland, Meghalaya, Cachar, Manipur, and Mizoram.
Species.Specimens: ZSI, NHMUK, UMMZ, AMNH, FMNH

Species.Author: Blyth
Species.AlternativeNames: Himalayan Shrike-Babbler _P. a. ripleyi_; Red-winged Shrike-Babbler; Blyth's Shrike-Babbler
Species.OriginalPublicationName: Journal of the Asiatic Society of Bengal

Subspecies.Author: Biswas
Subspecies.OriginalPublicationName: Bulletin of the British Ornithologists' Club
Subspecies.Taxonomy: Sometimes treated as a distinct species (e.g. H&M4) or as a subspecies of _P. validirostris_ or sometimes even as a junior synonym of _validirostris_ (e.g., RA2012).
Subspecies.Distribution: W Himalaya from about Kashmir (sporadic) Jammu, Himachal, and Uttarakhand.

Subspecies.Author: Koelz
Subspecies.OriginalPublicationName: Journal of the Zoological Society of India
Subspecies.Taxonomy: Taxonomic status of birds in N Bengal and Sikkim unresolved but tentatively parked under this taxon. Includes here _nocrecus_ Koelz 1952 from Tura mountain, Garo hills, E Meghalaya and _glauconotus_ Koelz 1954 from Sangau, Mizoram.
Subspecies.Distribution: N Bengal, Sikkim. W Arunachal, Nagaland, Meghalaya, Cachar, Manipur, and Mizoram.
Subspecies.Specimens: BNHS, ZSI, NHMUK, UMMZ, AMNH, FMNH

Subspecies.Author: Harington
Subspecies.OriginalPublicationName: Bulletin of the British Ornithologists' Club
Subspecies.Distribution: Kashmir (local), Himachal, and Uttarakhand.
Subspecies.Specimens: BNHS, NHMUK, UMMZ, AMNH, FMNH, MCZ, YPM

Subspecies.Author: Gray & Gray
Subspecies.OriginalPublicationName: Catalogue of the specimens and drawings of mammalia and birds of Nepal and Thibet. Presented by B. H. Hodgson, Esq. to the British Museum
Subspecies.Distribution: N Bengal, Sikkim, and Arunachal.

Subspecies.Author: Harington
Subspecies.OriginalPublicationName: Bulletin of the British Ornithologists' Club
Subspecies.Distribution: Nagaland, Manipur, and Mizoram.

Subspecies.Author: Hodgson
Subspecies.OriginalPublicationName: Journal of the Asiatic Society of Bengal
Subspecies.Taxonomy: Includes _melanops_ Koelz 1952 from Kohima, Nagaland.
Subspecies.Distribution: N Bengal, Sikkim, Arunachal, Nagaland, Meghalaya, Cachar, Manipur, and Mizoram.
Subspecies.Specimens: BNHS, ZSI, NHMUK, UMMZ, FMNH, MCZ, ROM, USNM, YPM

Species.Author: Hume
Species.OriginalPublicationName: Stray Feathers
Species.Taxonomy: Sometimes treated as a subspecies of extralimital _P. aenobarbus_ (Temminck, 1836) (HBW/BLI).

Subspecies.Author: Koelz
Subspecies.OriginalPublicationName: Contributions from the Institute for Regional Exploration
Subspecies.Distribution: Nokrek in Garo hills (Meghalaya).
Subspecies.Notes: One of the least known taxa from India. Not reported since its original collection in March 1950.

Genus.OriginalPublicationName: Journal of the Asiatic Society of Bengal
Genus.GenusDesignationText: ; Type by original designation and monotypy

Subspecies.OriginalPublicationName: Journal of the Asiatic Society of Bengal

Subspecies.Specimens: BNHS, ZSI, NHMUK, UMMZ, FMNH, USNM, YPM

Genus.Name: Pachycephala

Genus.OriginalPublicationName: Transactions of the Linnean Society of London

Subspecies.Author: Blyth
Subspecies.OriginalPublicationName: Journal of the Asiatic Society of Bengal
Subspecies.Distribution: S W Bengal, Barren Is, Andaman Is – N, Middle, S, and Little Andaman Is. as well as the islets of N Reef, Interview, Long, Outram, Havelock, Neil, Ross (Netaji), Tarmugli, Jolly Buoy, S Sentinel, and Rutland Is.
Subspecies.Notes: Except for a specimen from Andamans (ROM #54754) collected by Osmaston, no other specimens could be located.

Genus.Name: Oriolus
Genus.Author: Linnaeus
Genus.OriginalPublicationName: Systema Naturæ. Editio duodecima reformata. Tomus I [part 1]

Species.Author: Linnaeus

Species.Taxonomy: Includes _baltistanicus_ Koelz 1939 from Dagoni, Baltistan and _turkestanica_ Zarudny & Kudaschev 1918.
Species.Distribution: Breeding: Gilgit, Ladakh, and Kashmir along the Himalaya till N Bengal. Also, locally in Indo-Gangetic plains, E Rajasthan, Gujarat, C India, W Bengal, and the peninsula. Non-breeding: Throughout Indian peninsula till the southern tip.
Species.Specimens: BNHS, ZSI, NHMUK, UMMZ, AMNH, FMNH, MCZ, YPM, TNHM, HYD, GMC, LKO

Species.Author: Linnaeus
Species.OriginalPublicationName: Systema Naturæ. Editio duodecima reformata. Tomus I [part 1]

Subspecies.Author: Sharpe
Subspecies.OriginalPublicationName: Catalogue of the birds in the British Museum
Subspecies.Distribution: Winter: N Bengal, Sikkim, Assam, adjoining Arunachal, all NE hill states, S W Bengal, Jharkhand, E Madhya Pradesh, Chhattisgarh, Odisha, Andhra, Telangana, E Maharashtra, W Ghats from Surat Dangs till the southern tip in Tamil Nadu, W coastal plains, CE Ghats, SE Ghats, and E coastal plains.
Subspecies.Specimens: BNHS, ZSI, AMNH, FMNH, MCZ, ROM, LKO

Subspecies.Author: Beavan
Subspecies.OriginalPublicationName: Ibis
Subspecies.Distribution: N, Middle, S, and Little Andaman Is., including islets of N Reef, Interview, Long, Outram, Inglis, Havelock, Neil, Ross (Netaji), Alexandra, Tarmugli, Boat, Rutland, and N Cinque Is.
Subspecies.Specimens: BNHS, ZSI, NHMUK, MCZ, ROM, USNM, YPM

Subspecies.Author: Blyth
Subspecies.OriginalPublicationName: Journal of the Asiatic Society of Bengal
Subspecies.Distribution: Car Nicobar Is., C Nicobar group (Tillanchong, Teresa, Bompoka, Trinket, Kamorta, Nancowry, and Katchal Is.), and Great Nicobar Is.

Subspecies.Author: Blyth
Subspecies.OriginalPublicationName: Journal of the Asiatic Society of Bengal
Subspecies.Distribution: Summer: W Arunachal, Nagaland, and Manipur but also Sikkim (once). Winter: Also from N Bengal, W Assam, Meghalaya, and Mizoram.
Subspecies.Notes: Summer and winter status need better documentation.

Subspecies.Author: Linnaeus
Subspecies.OriginalPublicationName: Systema Naturæ per Regna Tria Naturæ, Secundum Classes, Ordines, Genera, Species, cum Characteribus, Differentiis, Synonymis, Locis. Tomus I. Editio decima, reformata
Subspecies.Distribution: Sub-Himalayan foothills and adjacent plains of E Punjab, SE Himachal, NW Haryana, Delhi region, S Uttarakhand, Uttar Pradesh, Bihar, S W Bengal, N Bengal, Sikkim, Brahmaputra plains of Assam and adjoining Arunachal, and all NE hill states.
Subspecies.Specimens: BNHS, ZSI, NHMUK, UMMZ, AMNH, FMNH, MCZ, USNM, YPM, LKO
Subspecies.Notes: Intergradation zone with _maderaspatanus_ roughly along the Ganga river; details not worked out.

Subspecies.Author: Franklin
Subspecies.OriginalPublicationName: Proceedings of the Committee of Science and Correspondence of the Zoological Society of London
Subspecies.Distribution: Kathiawar in Gujarat (locally), E Rajasthan and adjoining N Gujarat, C India including Madhya Pradesh, N and E Maharashtra, Chhattisgarh, Jharkhand and adjoining S W Bengal, Odisha, Telangana, NE Ghats of Andhra, W Ghats from Surat Dangs south till the southern tip, Deccan transition zone of the Ghats of Maharashtra and Karnataka, W coastal plains, SE and CE Ghats, and sporadic elsewhere in Deccan and E coastal plains.
Subspecies.Specimens: BNHS, ZSI, NHMUK, AMNH, FMNH, USNM

Subspecies.Author: Abdulali
Subspecies.OriginalPublicationName: Journal of the Bombay Natural History Society
Subspecies.Distribution: N, Middle, S, and Little Andaman Is. as well as Havelock Is.
Subspecies.Notes: Not as common as other endemic species and subspecies of Andaman Is. Not reports from many islets and very few reports from Middle Andaman.

Subspecies.Author: Vigors
Subspecies.OriginalPublicationName: Proceedings of the Committee of Science and Correspondence of the Zoological Society of London
Subspecies.Distribution: E Himachal, Uttarakhand, N Uttar Pradesh, N Bengal, Sikkim, Assam, Arunachal, and all NE hill states; sporadic in S W Bengal.
Subspecies.Specimens: BNHS, ZSI, UMZC, UMMZ, AMNH, FMNH, MCZ, ROM, USNM, YPM, LKO

Genus.Name: Artamus

Genus.OriginalPublicationName: Analyse d'une Nouvelle Ornithologie Élémentaire

Species.Author: Vieillot

Species.Distribution: Sub-Himalayan foothills of E Himachal, Uttarakhand and adjoining Punjab and Haryana; N Bengal, Sikkim, Assam, adjoining Arunachal, and all NE hill states. S W Bengal, Chota Nagpur plateau, C Indian highlands, W Gujarat, W and N Maharashtra, Chhattisgarh, Odisha, Andhra, Telangana, Karnataka, Tamil Nadu, and Kerala. Sporadic in Indo-Gangetic plains, E Rajasthan, WC Madhya Pradesh, Saurashtra, and Deccan.
Species.Specimens: BNHS, ZSI, NHMUK, UMMZ, AMNH, FMNH, MCZ, ROM, USNM, YPM, TNHM, MYS, HYD, LKO

Species.Author: Linnaeus
Species.OriginalPublicationName: Mantissa plantarum altera generum editionis VI et specierum editionis II

Subspecies.Author: Stresemann
Subspecies.OriginalPublicationName: Novitates Zoologicae
Subspecies.Distribution: N, Middle, S, and Little Andaman as well as islets of N Reef, Long, Outram, Nicholson, Havelok, Neil, Tarmugli, Alexandra, Boat, Rutland, and N Cinque Is.

Genus.Name: Tephrodornis
Genus.Author: Swainson
Genus.OriginalPublicationName: Fauna Boreali-Americana; or the zoology of the northern parts of British America: containing descriptions of the objects of natural history collected on the late northern land expeditions under command of Captain Sir John Franklin, R.N. Part second, the birds

Species.Author: Jerdon
Species.OriginalPublicationName: Madras Journal of Literature and Science
Species.Distribution: W Ghats from about south of SW Maharashtra till the southern tip in Kanyakumari district; east through the spur hills of Nilgiri and Palani hills. Historically in S Gujarat.
Species.Specimens: BNHS, ZSI, UMMZ, AMNH, FMNH, USNM, YPM, TNHM, LKO

Species.Author: Temminck
Species.OriginalPublicationName: Nouveau recueil de planches coloriées d'oiseaux, pour servir de suite et de complément aux planches enluminées de Buffon

Subspecies.Author: Hodgson
Subspecies.OriginalPublicationName: The India Review and Journal of Foreign Science and the Arts
Subspecies.Distribution: E Himachal, Uttarakhand, N Uttar Pradesh, N Bengal, Sikkim, Assam, Arunachal, and all NE hill states. Disjunctly in NE Ghats of Odisha, Chhattisgarh, and NE Andhra.
Subspecies.Specimens: BNHS, UMMZ, AMNH, FMNH, ROM, USNM, LKO

Subspecies.Author: Ticehurst
Subspecies.OriginalPublicationName: Bulletin of the British Ornithologists' Club
Subspecies.Taxonomy: Includes _freta_ Van Tyne & Koelz 1926 of Kangra distict, Himachal.
Subspecies.Distribution: Jammu foothills, Himachal, Punjab, Haryana, Delhi region, W Rajasthan, W Uttarakhand, Kachchh, and Saurashtra in Gujarat with some reaching till about Bhopal.

Subspecies.Author: Gmelin
Subspecies.OriginalPublicationName: Systema Naturae. Editio decima tertia, aucta, reformata. Cura Jo. Frid. Gmelin (etc.). Tomus I. Pars II
Subspecies.Taxonomy: Includes _warei_ Koelz 1939 of Londa, Belagavi, NW Karnataka.
Subspecies.Distribution: Himachal, Uttarakhand, Uttar Pradesh, E Rajasthan, E and S Gujarat, entire peninsular India, east till E Assam, W Meghalaya, and Tripura.
Subspecies.Specimens: BNHS, ZSI, NHMUK, UMMZ, AMNH, FMNH, MCZ, ROM, USNM, YPM, TNHM, HYD, LKO

Genus.Name: Hemipus
Genus.Author: Hodgson
Genus.OriginalPublicationName: Proceedings of the Zoological Society of London

Subspecies.Author: Horsfield
Subspecies.OriginalPublicationName: Proceedings of the Zoological Society of London
Subspecies.Distribution: Himachal (local), Uttarakhand, N Uttar Pradesh, N Bengal, Sikkim, Assam, Arunachal, and all the NE hill states. Stragglers to E Rajasthan and Lucknow (Uttar Pradesh).
Subspecies.Specimens: BNHS, ZSI, NHMUK, UMMZ, AMNH, FMNH, MCZ, ROM, USNM, YPM

Subspecies.Author: Sykes
Subspecies.OriginalPublicationName: Proceedings of the Committee of Science and Correspondence of the Zoological Society of London
Subspecies.Distribution: C Indian highlands of Madhya Pradesh, NE Maharashtra, Chhattisgarh, Chota Nagpur plateau of Jharkhand, W Bengal, and Odisha continuing along the NE Ghats of Odisha, Chhattisgarh, and NE Andhra. Semi-disjunctly in W Ghats from Surat Dangs all the way south till the tip of the peninsula; east through SE Ghats reaching the outskirts of Bengaluru (Karnataka) and Vellore (Tamil Nadu).
Subspecies.Specimens: BNHS, ZSI, NHMUK, UMMZ, AMNH, FMNH, MCZ, USNM, YPM, MYS
Subspecies.Notes: Following RA2012, subspecies _leggei_ Whistler 1939 restricted to Sri Lanka (contra AR2001).

Genus.Name: Aegithina
Genus.Author: Vieillot
Genus.OriginalPublicationName: Analyse d'une Nouvelle Ornithologie Élémentaire

Subspecies.Author: Gmelin
Subspecies.OriginalPublicationName: Systema Naturae. Editio decima tertia, aucta, reformata. Cura Jo. Frid. Gmelin (etc.). Tomus I. Pars II
Subspecies.Distribution: SW India from about SW Karnataka till the southern tip of Tamil Nadu including Rameswaram Is.

Subspecies.Author: Hall
Subspecies.OriginalPublicationName: Ibis
Subspecies.Taxonomy: The type of this subspecies is from Myanmar though phenotypically the males are very similar. It has been used as the name of this southern Indian population which is an intermediate between _humei_ of northern plains and _multicolor_ of southwest India (AR2001). This name continued to be used here though a fuller revision would necessitate a new name for this population; it does not make biogeographical sense to have the same name for disconnected populations in India and Myanmar.
Subspecies.Distribution: Southern Peninsula from Maharashtra, Andhra, Telangana, most of Karnataka except southwest, Tamil Nadu except the extreme south.
Subspecies.Specimens: BNHS, NHMUK, FMNH, ROM, USNM, YPM

Subspecies.Author: Baker
Subspecies.OriginalPublicationName: The fauna of British India, including Ceylon and Burma. Birds. 2nd ed.
Subspecies.Distribution: E Rajasthan, Gujarat, Madhya Pradesh, S Uttar Pradesh, S Bihar, Jharkhand, W Bengal, Odisha, and Chhattisgarh.
Subspecies.Specimens: BNHS, ZSI, NHMUK, UMMZ, AMNH, FMNH, MCZ, ROM, USNM, YPM, HYD

Subspecies.Author: Linnaeus
Subspecies.OriginalPublicationName: Systema Naturæ per Regna Tria Naturæ, Secundum Classes, Ordines, Genera, Species, cum Characteribus, Differentiis, Synonymis, Locis. Tomus I. Editio decima, reformata
Subspecies.Distribution: Himachal, Uttarakhand, N Uttar Pradesh, Bihar, N Bengal, Sikkim, Assam, and all NE hill states.
Subspecies.Specimens: BNHS, ZSI, NHMUK, UMMZ, AMNH, FMNH, USNM, YPM

Subspecies.Author: Koelz
Subspecies.OriginalPublicationName: Proceedings of the Biological Society of Washington
Subspecies.Distribution: Jammu foothills, N Punjab.

Species.Author: Marshall
Species.OriginalPublicationName: Stray Feathers
Species.Taxonomy: Suspected intergradation with Common Iora (see AR2001) is not proven and they overlap in range and habitat in several parts of its range. Includes _sulfurea_ Koelz 1954 from Sihor, Saurashtra, Gujarat. The listed syntype is from Sarahanpur, which is about 120km north of Meerut (Type locality). See Ganpule (2014) for a review and variations in plumage across its range.
Species.Distribution: N Haryana, W Uttar Pradesh, Delhi region, N Madhya Pradesh, E Rajasthan, Kachchh and Saurashtra regions in Gujarat. Disjunctly in S Deccan from about Bagalkot (N Karnataka), Hampi (C Karnataka), and Rollapadu (E Andhra) through the entire SE Ghats, till about S Tamil Nadu.
Species.Specimens: BNHS, NHMUK, UMMZ, AMNH, FMNH, USNM

Genus.Name: Rhipidura
Genus.Author: Vigors & Horsfield
Genus.OriginalPublicationName: Transactions of the Linnean Society of London
Genus.GenusDesignationPublicationName: , A list of the genera of birds, with an indication of the typical species of each genus

Subspecies.Author: Koelz
Subspecies.OriginalPublicationName: Proceedings of the Biological Society of Washington
Subspecies.Distribution: Along the base of W Himalaya from Kashmir, Jammu, Himachal, adjoining Punjab and N Haryana, Uttarakhand, and N Uttar Pradesh.

Subspecies.Author: Vieillot
Subspecies.OriginalPublicationName: Nouveau dictionnaire d'histoire naturelle, appliquée aux arts, à l'agriculture, à l'économie rurale et domestique, à la médecine, etc. Nouvelle édition
Subspecies.Distribution: Bihar, N Jharkhand, W Bengal, and Sikkim.
Subspecies.Specimens: BNHS, ZSI, NHMUK, UMMZ, FMNH, YPM
Subspecies.Notes: Possible migration to lowlands not worked out.

Subspecies.Author: Ripley
Subspecies.OriginalPublicationName: Proceedings of the Biological Society of Washington
Subspecies.Taxonomy: See Ripley 1955 for a treatise on this complex. intergrades with _albicollis_ in the plains of W Bengal.
Subspecies.Distribution: N Chhattisgarh, S Jharkhand, Odisha, and adjoining S W Bengal.

Subspecies.Author: Baker
Subspecies.OriginalPublicationName: Bulletin of the British Ornithologists' Club
Subspecies.Taxonomy: Intergrades with the nominate subspecies in Sikkim. This is the new name for _kempi_ Baker 1913.
Subspecies.Distribution: Sikkim, Assam, Arunachal, and all NE hill states.
Subspecies.Specimens: BNHS, ZSI, NHMUK, UMMZ, FMNH, ROM, USNM, YPM

Subspecies.Author: Lesson
Subspecies.OriginalPublicationName: Voyage aux Indes Orientales par le Nord de l'Europe, les provinces du Caucase, la Géorgie, l'Arménie et la Perse (etc.). Zoologie
Subspecies.Taxonomy: Includes _pectoralis_ Jerdon 1847 from Nilgiris. Follows H&M4 in dating it as 1832 (contra 1831), see also Dickinson (2008) and Dickinson _et al._ (2011).
Subspecies.Distribution: E Rajasthan (Jaipur, Sawai Madhopur) through Mt. Abu, N and E Gujarat, entire C India including Madhya Pradesh, Chhattisgarh, and N and E Maharashtra, along the W Ghats from Surat Dangs till about Goa and N Karnataka; extending through the Deccan transition zone on the eastern slopes of CW Ghats till the base of Nilgiris; NW Telangana, NE Karnataka, CE Ghats of Andhra (south of Godavari river), SE Ghats of Andhra, and Tamil Nadu; sporadic south of the Nilgiris till about Palakkad gap.

Subspecies.Author: Whistler
Subspecies.OriginalPublicationName: Bulletin of the British Ornithologists' Club
Subspecies.Taxonomy: Intergrades with _R. a. orissae_ Ripley 1955 in Odisha.
Subspecies.Distribution: NE Ghats of Andhra and S Odisha.

Subspecies.Author: Lesson
Subspecies.OriginalPublicationName: Traité d'Ornithologie, ou Tableau Méthodique des ordres, sous-ordres, familles, tribus, genres, sous-genres et races d'oiseaux
Subspecies.Distribution: N India from about Jammu (sporadic), Himachal, Punjab, and south through Delhi region, west through Rajasthan and Gujarat; east through Gangetic plains till S W Bengal, C India, Chota Nagpur plateau, NE Ghats, NW Ghats from Surat Dangs till about Goa, and N Deccan (locally).
Subspecies.Specimens: BNHS, ZSI, NHMUK, UMMZ, AMNH, FMNH, ROM, YPM

Subspecies.Author: Blyth
Subspecies.OriginalPublicationName: Journal of the Asiatic Society of Bengal
Subspecies.Taxonomy: Intergrades with the nominate subspecies in S Maharashtra.
Subspecies.Distribution: S India in SE Ghats, locally in S and C Deccan till S Maharashtra, eastern edges of CW and SW Ghats, and SW coastal plains (locally).
Subspecies.Specimens: BNHS, ZSI, NHMUK, AMNH, FMNH, ROM, USNM, YPM, TNHM, HYD

Subspecies.Author: Hume
Subspecies.OriginalPublicationName: Stray Feathers
Subspecies.Distribution: E Manipur and Mizoram.
Subspecies.Notes: No recent reports and no specimens (RA2012) as well; but AR2001 has mapped it for Cachar.

Genus.Name: Dicrurus
Genus.Author: Vieillot
Genus.OriginalPublicationName: Analyse d'une Nouvelle Ornithologie Élémentaire
Genus.GenusDesignationPublicationName: , A list of the genera of birds, with their synonyma and with an indication of the typical species of each genus. 2nd. ed.

Subspecies.OriginalPublicationName: The India Review and Journal of Foreign Science and the Arts
Subspecies.Taxonomy: Includes _tsipi_ Koelz 1954 from Palasbari, Assam; from where they tend to show affinities towards _cathoecus_ Swinhoe 1871 of Myanmar. (AR2001).
Subspecies.Distribution: N subcontinent from Kashmir, Ladakh (sporadic), Jammu, south till about S Rajasthan, N Madhya Pradesh, S Uttar Pradesh, Jharkhand, and S W Bengal; extending northeast through N Bengal, Sikkim, Assam, Arunachal, and all NE hill states.
Subspecies.Specimens: BNHS, ZSI, UMZC, UMMZ, AMNH, FMNH, MCZ, ROM, USNM, YPM

Subspecies.Author: Vieillot

Subspecies.Taxonomy: Includes _peninsularis_ Ticehurst 1932 from Chennai [=Madras] city.
