Subspecies.Author: Sykes
Subspecies.OriginalPublicationName: Proceedings of the Committee of Science and Correspondence of the Zoological Society of London
Subspecies.Taxonomy: Includes here _affinis_ Blyth 1843 from Tenasserim and Darjeeling.
Subspecies.Distribution: Summer: W Himalaya from Kashmir, Himachal, and Uttarakhand. Winter: Throughout India, locally, as west as Kachchh, south till Tamil Nadu and Kerala, nearly absent in SW coastal plains and E coastal plains; also, Arunachal, Assam, and all NE hill states; Middle and S Andaman Is., Car Nicobar Is. (historical).
Subspecies.Specimens: BNHS, ZSI, NHMUK, UMMZ, AMNH, FMNH, MCZ, ROM, USNM, TNHM

Subspecies.Author: Müller
Subspecies.OriginalPublicationName: Des Ritters Carl von Linné ... vollständigen Natursystems Supplements- und Register-Band über alle sechs Theile oder Classen des Thierreichs
Subspecies.Distribution: NE India, Andaman & Nicobar Is.
Subspecies.Notes: May be expected during migration.

Genus.Name: Saxicola
Genus.Author: Bechstein
Genus.OriginalPublicationName: Ornithologisches Taschenbuch von und für Deutschland (etc.)
Genus.GenusDesignationPublicationName: , The Zoological Journal

Species.Author: Linnaeus
Species.OriginalPublicationName: Systema Naturæ per Regna Tria Naturæ, Secundum Classes, Ordines, Genera, Species, cum Characteribus, Differentiis, Synonymis, Locis. Tomus I. Editio decima, reformata
Species.Distribution: Vagrant. Reported from Kodagu (Karnataka), Dharapuram (Tamil Nadu), Ladakh, and Goa.

Species.Author: Stoliczka
Species.OriginalPublicationName: Journal of the Asiatic Society of Bengal
Species.Distribution: Non-breeding: NW India from SW Haryana, Delhi region, Bharatpur, W through Rajasthan till C Gujarat and Kachchh; sporadically in Maharashtra and Aligarh, Uttar Pradesh (historical).
Species.Specimens: NHMUK, UMMZ, AMNH, FMNH

Species.Author: Gray & Gray
Species.OriginalPublicationName: Catalogue of the specimens and drawings of mammalia and birds of Nepal and Thibet. Presented by B. H. Hodgson, Esq. to the British Museum
Species.Distribution: Winter: NW Haryana (Ambala, historical), S Uttarakhand, Uttar Pradesh south till Ayodhya region, Bihar (historical), N Bengal, and Brahmaputra plains of Assam.
Species.Specimens: BNHS, NHMUK, AMNH, YPM

Species.Author: Pallas
Species.AlternativeNames: Eastern Stonechat (with _S stejnegeri_); Collared Bushchat, Common Stonechat (with _south torquatus_)

Subspecies.Author: Pallas
Subspecies.OriginalPublicationName: Reise durch verschiedene Provinzen des Russischen Reichs
Subspecies.Distribution: Winter: N and NW India till about Nashik (W Maharashtra).

Subspecies.Author: Blyth
Subspecies.OriginalPublicationName: Journal of the Asiatic Society of Bengal
Subspecies.Distribution: Summer: Gilgit, Ladakh, Kashmir, Jammu, Himachal, Uttarakhand, N Bengal, Sikkim, Arunachal, Assam, Nagaland, Meghalaya, and Manipur. Winter: Extending throughout the subcontinent, south till Kerala and Tamil Nadu; entire W, C, E and NE India.
Subspecies.Specimens: BNHS, ZSI, NHMUK, UMMZ, AMNH, FMNH, MCZ, ROM, YPM, MYS, HYD
Subspecies.Notes: Presence in Andaman Is (vs Amur Stonechat) has not been established.

Subspecies.Author: Pleske
Subspecies.OriginalPublicationName: Nauchnuie rezul'tatui puteshestvii N. M. Przheval'skago po tzentral'noi Azii (etc.)
Subspecies.OriginalPublicationReference: Zool. Theil. 2, Vögel p.46, pl. 4, fig. 1, 2, 3
Subspecies.Distribution: Winter: Foothills of Himalaya from Himachal, Uttarakhand, Uttar Pradesh, N Bihar, N Bengal, Assam, Arunachal, Nagaland, and Meghalaya.
Subspecies.Specimens: BNHS, ZSI, NHMUK, UMMZ, AMNH, FMNH, ROM, YPM

Species.Author: Parrot
Species.OriginalPublicationName: Verhandlungen der Ornithologischen Gesellschaft in Bayern
Species.Taxonomy: Not always recognised (see HBW/BLI, H&M4) and treated is a subspecies of _S. maurus_.
Species.Distribution: Winter: N Bengal, Assam, Meghalaya, Manipur, and Andaman Is.
Species.Specimens: BNHS, UMMZ, AMNH, ROM, YPM

Species.Author: Blyth
Species.OriginalPublicationName: Journal of the Asiatic Society of Bengal
Species.Distribution: Indo-Gangetic and Brahmaputra plains from Jammu, S Himachal, Punjab, Haryana, Delhi region, S Uttarakhand, Uttar Pradesh, Bihar, W Bengal (along the Ganga), Odisha (historical), Assam, E Arunachal, and Manipur valley.
Species.Specimens: BNHS, ZSI, NHMUK, UMMZ, AMNH, FMNH, YPM

Species.Author: Linnaeus
Species.OriginalPublicationName: Systema Naturæ. Editio duodecima reformata. Tomus I [part 1]

Subspecies.Author: Hartert
Subspecies.OriginalPublicationName: Journal für Ornithologie
Subspecies.Taxonomy: Not always recognised and synonymised with _bicolor_ (AR2001, RA2012).
Subspecies.Distribution: Winter: Rajasthan, Gujarat.
Subspecies.Notes: There exist specimens labelled Etawah (AMNH), Gorakhpur (AMNH), Sambhar (MCZ), and Kullu (MCZ) – except Sambhar, other three sites are well within the breeding range of _bicolor_. Not investigated further.

Subspecies.Author: Sykes
Subspecies.OriginalPublicationName: Proceedings of the Committee of Science and Correspondence of the Zoological Society of London
Subspecies.Taxonomy: Includes _rupchandi_ Koelz 1939 from Londa, NW Karnataka.
Subspecies.Distribution: Along the Indo-Gangetic plains and adjoining sub-Himalayan foothills from Kashmir, Jammu, Himachal, Punjab, Haryana, Delhi region, Uttarakhand, Uttar Pradesh, Bihar, and N Bengal; possibly extending west through Rajasthan to Gujarat.
Subspecies.Specimens: BNHS, ZSI, NHMUK, UMMZ, AMNH, FMNH, MCZ, ROM, USNM, YPM

Subspecies.Author: Baker
Subspecies.OriginalPublicationName: Bulletin of the British Ornithologists' Club
Subspecies.Distribution: C India from Madhya Pradesh, Chhattisgarh, S W Bengal, Odisha, Maharashtra, Karnataka, Telangana, Andhra, and Tamil Nadu; extending to Assam, and all NE hill states.
Subspecies.Specimens: BNHS, ZSI, NHMUK, UMMZ, FMNH, ROM, USNM, YPM, HYD
Subspecies.Notes: Intergradation zone with other subspecies not worked out. Movements exist as well.

Subspecies.Author: Whistler
Subspecies.OriginalPublicationName: Bulletin of the British Ornithologists' Club
Subspecies.Distribution: Hill of SW Ghats from Nilgiris to Kalakkad.
Subspecies.Specimens: BNHS, NHMUK, UMMZ, AMNH, FMNH, ROM, USNM, YPM, TNHM

Species.Author: Blyth
Species.OriginalPublicationName: Ibis
Species.Taxonomy: New name for _melanoleuca_ Jerdon 1863. ZSI#35546 also listed as Holotype but presumably is another Syntype.
Species.Distribution: E Bihar (historical), Odisha (historical), W Bengal (historical), Brahmaputra plains of C and E Assam (locally), and Manipur valley.
Species.Specimens: BNHS, NHMUK, UMMZ, AMNH, FMNH, MCZ, ROM, USNM, YPM

Subspecies.Author: Hartert
Subspecies.OriginalPublicationName: Die Vögel der paläarktischen Fauna. Systematische Übersicht der in Europa, Nord-Asien und der Mittelmeerregion vorkommenden Vögel
Subspecies.Taxonomy: This subspecies reportedly darker and smaller has been purported to winter in NE India (RA2012). Difference in retrix plumage (Saha _et al._ 1979) also reported but the ZSI specimens from Mizoram does not show these differences. No other specimens examined and hence treated here as tentative.
Subspecies.Distribution: NE hill states.
Subspecies.Notes: No definitive specimens located.

Subspecies.Author: Gray & Gray
Subspecies.OriginalPublicationName: Catalogue of the specimens and drawings of mammalia and birds of Nepal and Thibet. Presented by B. H. Hodgson, Esq. to the British Museum
Subspecies.Distribution: Summer: Along the Himalaya from Kashmir, through Jammu, Himachal, Uttarakhand, N Bengal, Sikkim, Arunachal, Nagaland, Meghalaya, Cachar, Manipur, and Mizoram. Winter: Extends sporadically in N India to Punjab, Haryana, Delhi region, Uttar Pradesh, Bihar, Rajasthan, Madhya Pradesh, S W Bengal, reaching as far as south as Nagpur (E Maharashtra) and Uttar Kannada (NW Karnataka); also, Assam and all NE hill states.

Genus.Name: Oenanthe
Genus.Author: Vieillot
Genus.OriginalPublicationName: Analyse d'une Nouvelle Ornithologie Élémentaire

Subspecies.Author: Linnaeus
Subspecies.OriginalPublicationName: Systema Naturæ per Regna Tria Naturæ, Secundum Classes, Ordines, Genera, Species, cum Characteribus, Differentiis, Synonymis, Locis. Tomus I. Editio decima, reformata
Subspecies.Distribution: Vagrant. Reported from Sikkim (once) and E Arunachal (once).
Subspecies.Notes: Records along E Himalaya indicate that the nominate subspecies may be involved as well in our region. See Abhinav _et al._ (2020) for a review. AMNH#582920 collected from the Gurais valley, Kashmir has not been examined.

Subspecies.Author: Hemprich & Ehrenberg
Subspecies.OriginalPublicationName: Symbolae physicae seu icones et descriptiones corporum naturalium novorum aut minus cognitorum quae ex itineribus per Libyam Aegyptum Nubiam Dongolam Syrian Arabiam et Habessianiam publico institutis (etc.)
Subspecies.Distribution: Breeding: Gilgit and Ladakh (?). Non-breeding: Scattered reports during passage from Himachal, Uttarakhand, Gujarat, Karnataka, and Kerala.
Subspecies.Notes: Breeding population in Gilgit (Abhinav _et al._ 2020), and presumably in Ladakh, could be this subspecies. Other reports are tentatively parked under this subspecies; but S Indian reports could be that of the nominate subspecies as well.

Species.Author: Temminck
Species.OriginalPublicationName: Nouveau recueil de planches coloriées d'oiseaux, pour servir de suite et de complément aux planches enluminées de Buffon
Species.Distribution: Winter: NW India from Punjab, Rajasthan, Gujarat, W Maharashtra, Telangana, and N Karnataka. Sporadic during passage from Gilgit, Ladakh and Kashmir in the N India to S Kerala and S Tamil Nadu in the south; and S W Bengal, Assam and NE Arunachal in the east.
Species.Specimens: BNHS, ZSI, NHMUK, UMMZ, AMNH, ROM, USNM

Subspecies.Author: Temminck
Subspecies.OriginalPublicationName: Nouveau recueil de planches coloriées d'oiseaux, pour servir de suite et de complément aux planches enluminées de Buffon
Subspecies.Taxonomy: Includes _atrogularis_ Blyth 1847 from Agra.
Subspecies.Distribution: Winter: Most of the NW Indian subcontinent from Punjab and Himachal through Rajasthan, Gujarat, Madhya Pradesh, Maharashtra, east till E Uttar Pradesh and Chhattisgarh and south till Telangana and N Karnataka. Stragglers further east (NE Arunachal, Sikkim, S W Bengal, E Odisha) noted; passage through Gilgit, Ladakh, Kashmir, and Jammu.
Subspecies.Specimens: BNHS, ZSI, NHMUK, UMMZ, AMNH, FMNH, MCZ, ROM, USNM, YPM
Subspecies.Notes: Subspecies of stragglers in E India not determined but tentatively parked under this.

Subspecies.Author: Oberholser
Subspecies.OriginalPublicationName: Proceedings of the United States National Museum
Subspecies.Taxonomy: New name for _montana_ Gould 1865.
Subspecies.Distribution: Breeding: Gilgit, Ladakh, Kashmir, N Himachal (Lahaul-Spiti). Stragglers reported from Kerala and Tamil Nadu.
Subspecies.Specimens: BNHS, NHMUK, UMMZ, FMNH, ROM, USNM
Subspecies.Notes: Mostly winters extralimitally in Africa (RA2012) and stragglers in S India must be from this African migratory population.

Species.Author: Lepekhin
Species.OriginalPublicationName: Novi Commentarii Academiae Scientiarum Imperialis Petropolitanae
Species.Distribution: Breeding: Gilgit, Ladakh and Lahaul-Spiti as well as locally in Kashmir. Non-breeding: Passage migrants reported from W coast from Goa, SW Karnataka, and N Kerala as well as Uttarakhand, S W Bengal, and Sikkim.
Species.Specimens: BNHS, NHMUK, UMMZ, AMNH, FMNH

Species.Author: Blyth
Species.OriginalPublicationName: Journal of the Asiatic Society of Bengal
Species.Taxonomy: Includes _ruinarum_ Koelz 1939 from Sanchi, Madhya Pradesh.
Species.Distribution: Entire N Indian subcontinent from Kashmir, Jammu, Himachal onwards, entire NW India of Rajasthan and Gujarat; south till N Karnataka and Telangana; east to S W Bengal, W Odisha and NE Andhra (once).
Species.Specimens: BNHS, ZSI, NHMUK, UMMZ, AMNH, FMNH, YPM

Species.Author: Blyth
Species.OriginalPublicationName: Journal of the Asiatic Society of Bengal
Species.Taxonomy: Three forms – _picata_ Blyth 1847 from Scinde [=Sindh], _capistrata_ Gould 1865 from 'Upper Provinces of Hindostan' = Sindh, and _opistholeuca_ Strickland 1849 from 'Northern India' = Punjab sometimes treated as subspecies, or even species – with names Blyth's Wheatear, Strickland's Wheatear, and Gould's Wheatear respectively (see Shirihai & Svensson 2018).
Species.Distribution: Summer: Gilgit (_picata_ and _capistrata_), Ladakh (_capistrata_), and Kashmir. Winter: Rajasthan and Gujarat mainly – but also in Jammu, Himachal, Delhi region, Punjab, Uttarakhand, E Uttar Pradesh, N Madhya Pradesh, and Maharashtra (except _opistholeuca_). _capistrata_ has occurred once in NW Tamil Nadu.
Species.Specimens: BNHS, ZSI, NHMUK, UMMZ, AMNH, FMNH, MCZ, ROM, USNM, YPM

Species.Author: Hume
Species.OriginalPublicationName: Stray Feathers
Species.Distribution: Historical reports from Gilgit and Suru valley (Ladakh).
Species.Specimens: BNHS, ZSI, NHMUK, AMNH

Species.Author: Heuglin
Species.OriginalPublicationName: Ornithologie Nordost-Afrika's, der Nilquellen- und Küsten-Gebiete des Rothen Meeres und des nördlichen Somal-Landes

Subspecies.Author: Oates
Subspecies.OriginalPublicationName: The fauna of British India, including Ceylon and Burma. Birds. 1st ed.
Subspecies.Distribution: Winter: Thar (W Rajasthan) only.
Subspecies.Notes: Based on specimens from Afghanistan, Indian birds assumed to be of this subspecies. See Wasnik _et al._ (2019).

Species.Author: de Filippi
Species.OriginalPublicationName: Archivio per la Zoologia, l'Anatomia e la Fisiologia
Species.Distribution: Winter: NW India – E Rajasthan and Kachchh. Passage migrants reported from Jammu, Uttarakhand, Uttar Pradesh, Delhi region, and N Bengal.
Species.Specimens: BNHS, NHMUK, FMNH

Genus.Name: Bombycilla
Genus.Author: Vieillot
Genus.OriginalPublicationName: Histoire naturelle des oiseaux de l'Amérique Septentrionale, depuis Saint Dominique jusqu'à la baie de Hudson; contenant un grand nombre d'espèces décrites ou figurées pour la première fois

Subspecies.Author: Linnaeus
Subspecies.OriginalPublicationName: Systema Naturæ per Regna Tria Naturæ, Secundum Classes, Ordines, Genera, Species, cum Characteribus, Differentiis, Synonymis, Locis. Tomus I. Editio decima, reformata
Subspecies.Distribution: Only from Srinagar (Kashmir, historical) and Lahaul (Himachal).
Subspecies.Notes: See Rawal _et al._ (2017) for details of the recent record as well as the historical specimen (NHMUK#1949.Whi.1.14924).

Genus.Name: Hypocolius
Genus.Author: Bonaparte
Genus.OriginalPublicationName: Conspectus generum avium

Species.Author: Bonaparte
Species.OriginalPublicationName: Conspectus generum avium
Species.Distribution: Winter: Kachchh, sporadically in Kathiawar peninsula, Gujarat, rarely in Mumbai region.
Species.Specimens: BNHS

Genus.Name: Dicaeum
Genus.Author: Cuvier
Genus.OriginalPublicationName: Le règne animal distribué d'après son organisation, pour servir de base a l'histoire naturelle des animaux et d'introduction à l'anatomie comparée
Genus.GenusDesignationPublicationName: , A list of the genera of birds, with an indication of the typical species of each genus

Subspecies.Author: Tickell
Subspecies.OriginalPublicationName: Journal of the Asiatic Society of Bengal
Subspecies.Taxonomy: Includes _saturatior_ Koelz 1939 from Londa, NW Karnataka.
Subspecies.Distribution: Along the base of Himalaya from Kashmir, Jammu through Himachal, Punjab, Haryana, Uttarakhand, Uttar Pradesh, Delhi region, E Rajasthan, C India, Bihar, Jharkhand, W Bengal, C and E Gujarat, south through W Ghats, E Ghats, and Deccan (locally) till the southern tip with the exception of SW and SE coast.
Subspecies.Specimens: BNHS, ZSI, NHMUK, UMMZ, AMNH, FMNH, ROM, USNM, YPM, TNHM, HYD

Subspecies.Author: Riley
Subspecies.OriginalPublicationName: Proceedings of the Biological Society of Washington
Subspecies.Taxonomy: Subspecies not always recognised and synonymised with _modestum_ Hume 1935. Includes here _deignani_ Ripley 1952 from Kohima, Nagaland. This along with other SE Asian subspecies proposed to be split into a new species 'Modest Flowerpecker' (RA2012).
Subspecies.Distribution: Historically in Nagaland (Kohima), Meghalaya (Mawrygkneng, Khasi hills), Cachar, Manipur (Karong), and Mizoram.
Subspecies.Notes: No recent media reports. An unconfirmed report from Tripura.

Species.Author: Temminck
Species.OriginalPublicationName: Nouveau recueil de planches coloriées d'oiseaux, pour servir de suite et de complément aux planches enluminées de Buffon

Subspecies.Author: Blyth
Subspecies.OriginalPublicationName: Journal of the Asiatic Society of Bengal
Subspecies.Taxonomy: Includes _intensum_ Baker 1921 from Sikkim.
Subspecies.Distribution: N Bengal, Assam, adjacent Arunachal, and all NE hill states.
Subspecies.Specimens: BNHS, NHMUK, UMMZ, AMNH, FMNH, USNM, YPM

Species.Author: Blyth
Species.OriginalPublicationName: Journal of the Asiatic Society of Bengal
Species.Distribution: Almora, Uttarakhand (historical), N Bengal, Sikkim, Arunachal, Assam, Nagaland, Meghalaya, Cachar, Manipur, and Mizoram.
Species.Specimens: UMMZ, FMNH, ROM

Subspecies.Author: Latham
Subspecies.OriginalPublicationName: Index ornithologicus, sive systema ornithologiæ; complectens avium divisionem in classes, ordines, genera, species, ipsarumque varietates: adjectis synonymis, locis, descriptionibus, &c.
Subspecies.Distribution: Along the foothills of Himalaya from Kashmir through Jammu, Himachal, Uttarakhand, and adjoining Haryana and N Uttar Pradesh; more regular from Lucknow onwards through E Uttar Pradesh, Bihar, Jharkhand, and W Bengal till extreme NE Bengal; sporadic or locally in W Assam and Meghalaya as well as Tripura. Also, entire peninsular India from Gujarat, C Madhya Pradesh, Jharkhand, and south till the southern tip of the peninsula. Absent elsewhere in NE India.
Subspecies.Specimens: BNHS, ZSI, NHMUK, UMMZ, AMNH, FMNH, USNM, YPM
Subspecies.Notes: Many reports from NE India require verification due to the presence of other juvenile Flowerpeckers having pale bills.

Species.Author: Jerdon
Species.OriginalPublicationName: Madras Journal of Literature and Science
Species.Taxonomy: Includes _subflavum_ Baker 1921 from Belagavi, Karnataka and _unicolor_ Koelz 1939 from Kodaikanal, Palani hills, Tamil Nadu.
Species.Distribution: W Ghats from about Mumbai south till the southern tip of the Ghats in Kanyakumari district; also locally in W coast, and the transition region in the Deccan; extending east through the hillocks of SE Ghats (Melagiri, Yelagiri, Javadhu, Servarayan, and Kolli hills) sometimes reaching Hubballi, Mysuru, and Bengaluru.
Species.Specimens: BNHS, ZSI, NHMUK, AMNH, FMNH, USNM, YPM, TNHM

Species.Author: Swinhoe
Species.OriginalPublicationName: Ibis

Subspecies.Author: Walden
Subspecies.OriginalPublicationName: The Annals and Magazine of Natural History including Zoology, Botany, and Geology
Subspecies.Distribution: N Bengal, Sikkim, Assam, Arunachal, and all NE hill states.
Subspecies.Specimens: BNHS, ZSI, NHMUK, UMMZ, AMNH, FMNH, USNM, YPM
Subspecies.Notes: Presence in Chhattisgarh and NE Andhra suspected (see RA2012).

Species.Author: Hume
Species.OriginalPublicationName: Stray Feathers
Species.Taxonomy: Sometimes treated as a subspecies of _D. minullum_ Swinhoe, 1870 (HBW/BLI).
Species.Distribution: N, Middle, S, and Little Andaman Is. as well as Interview, Outram, Nicholson, Havelock, Neil, Tarmugli, and Rutland Is.
Species.Specimens: BNHS, NHMUK

Subspecies.Author: Blyth
Subspecies.OriginalPublicationName: Journal of the Asiatic Society of Bengal
Subspecies.Taxonomy: Includes _pulchellum_ Koelz 1954 from Sangau, Mizoram.
Subspecies.Distribution: Along the Himalaya from Kashmir, Jammu, Himachal, adjoining Haryana, Uttarakhand, N Bengal, Sikkim, Arunachal, Assam, Nagaland, Meghalaya, Cachar, Manipur, and Mizoram.
Subspecies.Specimens: BNHS, ZSI, NHMUK, UMMZ, FMNH, ROM, YPM

Subspecies.Author: Linnaeus
Subspecies.OriginalPublicationName: Systema Naturæ per Regna Tria Naturæ, Secundum Classes, Ordines, Genera, Species, cum Characteribus, Differentiis, Synonymis, Locis. Tomus I. Editio decima, reformata
Subspecies.Distribution: W Bengal (disjunct populations in south and north), Sikkim (historical), Assam, adjoining Arunachal, and all NE hill states.
Subspecies.Specimens: BNHS, ZSI, NHMUK, UMMZ, AMNH, FMNH, ROM, USNM, YPM
Subspecies.Notes: No recent reports from Sikkim.

Genus.Name: Chalcoparia
Genus.Author: Cabanis
Genus.OriginalPublicationName: Museum Heineanum. Verzeichniss der orithologischen Sammlung des Oberamtmann Ferdinand Heine

Species.Author: Gmelin
Species.OriginalPublicationName: Systema Naturae. Editio decima tertia, aucta, reformata. Cura Jo. Frid. Gmelin (etc.). Tomus I. Pars II

Subspecies.Author: Kloss
Subspecies.OriginalPublicationName: Bulletin of the British Ornithologists' Club
Subspecies.Taxonomy: New name for _C s. lepida_ Latham 1790 and _C s. rubinigentis_ Baker 1930.
Subspecies.Distribution: N Bengal, S Sikkim, Assam, Arunachal, and all NE hill states; sporadically in S W Bengal (Hijuli); disjunctly in the NE Ghats of Odisha, S Chhattisgarh, NE Andhra till the Godavari river.
Subspecies.Notes: Sight record from Uttarakhand (RA2012) not traced.

Genus.Name: Leptocoma
Genus.Author: Cabanis
Genus.OriginalPublicationName: Museum Heineanum. Verzeichniss der orithologischen Sammlung des Oberamtmann Ferdinand Heine

Species.Author: Linnaeus
Species.OriginalPublicationName: Systema Naturæ. Editio duodecima reformata. Tomus I [part 1]

Subspecies.Author: Hermann
Subspecies.OriginalPublicationName: Observationes zoologicae quibus novae complures, aliaeque animalium species describuntur et illustrantur
Subspecies.Taxonomy: Includes _sola_ Vieillot 1819 from Pondicherry [=Puducherry] and _whistleri_ Ripley 1946 from Muddur, Mysuru.
Subspecies.Distribution: Indian subcontinent S from Gujarat, E Rajasthan, Madhya Pradesh, Jharkhand, W Bengal, as well as Tripura and Cachar; and south till tip of the peninsula; sporadically extending north to Jodhpur, Sariska (both Rajasthan), Darbhanga (Bihar) and E through Jalpaiguri, Assam (including E), W Meghalaya, Manipur valley, and Mizoram.
Subspecies.Specimens: BNHS, ZSI, NHMUK, UMMZ, FMNH, YPM, TNHM, HYD
Subspecies.Notes: Range expansion to the north and east in the last few decades.

Species.Author: Sykes
Species.OriginalPublicationName: Proceedings of the Committee of Science and Correspondence of the Zoological Society of London
Species.Distribution: W Ghats from Nashik till southern tip of the Ghats in Kanyakumari district (Tamil Nadu). SW Monsoon: Sporadically in Deccan hillocks; rarely in SW coast.
Species.Specimens: BNHS, NHMUK, UMMZ, AMNH, FMNH, YPM, TNHM, LKO

Species.Author: Gmelin
Species.AlternativeNames: Maroon-bellied Sunbird, Purple-throated Sunbird (with _L. sperata_ EL)

Subspecies.Author: Gmelin
Subspecies.OriginalPublicationName: Systema Naturae. Editio decima tertia, aucta, reformata. Cura Jo. Frid. Gmelin (etc.). Tomus I [pars I]
Subspecies.Distribution: Karimganj (Cachar) and Tripura (historical).
Subspecies.Notes: See Ismavel & Praveen (2015) for historical records. Meghalaya sight report not evaluated.

Genus.Name: Cinnyris
Genus.Author: Cuvier
Genus.OriginalPublicationName: Le règne animal distribué d'après son organisation, pour servir de base a l'histoire naturelle des animaux et d'introduction à l'anatomie comparée
Genus.GenusDesignationPublicationName: , Catalogue of the genera and subgenera of birds contained in the British Museum

Subspecies.Author: Blanford
Subspecies.OriginalPublicationName: Ibis
Subspecies.Distribution: W Rajasthan and Kachchh.

Subspecies.Author: Latham
Subspecies.OriginalPublicationName: Index ornithologicus, sive systema ornithologiæ; complectens avium divisionem in classes, ordines, genera, species, ipsarumque varietates: adjectis synonymis, locis, descriptionibus, &c.
Subspecies.Distribution: Throughout India from the Himalayan foothills of Kashmir, Jammu through entire N India, E and C Rajasthan, C India, Indo-Gangetic plains till W Bengal, Gujarat (including Kathiawar peninsula), and the entire southern peninsula.
Subspecies.Specimens: BNHS, ZSI, NHMUK, UMMZ, AMNH, FMNH, YPM, HYD, LKO
Subspecies.Notes: Intergrades with _brevirostris_ in Rajasthan and Gujarat and with _intermedius_ in Bengal and E India.

Subspecies.Author: Hume
Subspecies.OriginalPublicationName: Ibis
Subspecies.Distribution: E India from NE Andhra, Odisha, W Bengal, S Sikkim, Assam, and all NE hill states.

Species.Author: Lesson
Species.OriginalPublicationName: Dictionnaire des sciences naturelles, dans lequel on traite méthodiquement des différens êtres de la nature, considérés soit en eux-mêmes, d'après l'état actuel de nos connoissances, soit relativement à l'utilité qu'en peuvent retirer la médecine, l'agriculture, le commerce et les arts. Suivi d'une biographie des plus célèbres naturalistes ...Par plusieurs professeurs du Jardin du Roi, et des principales écoles de Paris
Species.Taxonomy: Previously lumped with extralimital _C jugularis (Linnaeus 1766); a taxonomy sometimes still followed (HBW/BLI).

Subspecies.Author: Hume
Subspecies.OriginalPublicationName: Stray Feathers
Subspecies.Taxonomy: Unnithan (1996) suggests a full subspecies status for birds in Narcondam Is.
Subspecies.Distribution: Narcondam Is., N, Middle, S, and Little Andaman Is., as well as islets of Ross, N Reef, Interview, Long, Outram, Nicholson, Havelock, Neil, Ross (Netaji), Tarmugli, Alexandra, Redskin, Boat, Jolly Buoy, and Rutland Is.

Subspecies.Author: Richmond
Subspecies.OriginalPublicationName: Proceedings of the United States National Museum
Subspecies.Taxonomy: Unnithan (1996) suggests a full subspecies status for the birds in C Nicobar group. Includes _blanfordi_ Baker 1921 from Kondul Is., S Nicobar group.
Subspecies.Distribution: C Nicobar group (Tillanchong, Teresa, Bompoka, Trinket, Kamorta, Nancowry, and Katchal), S Nicobar group (Treis, Trak, Meroe, Kondol, Little, and Great Nicobar Is.).

Subspecies.Author: Oberholser
Subspecies.OriginalPublicationName: Journal of the Washington Academy of Sciences
Subspecies.Distribution: Car Nicobar Is.

Species.Author: Linnaeus
Species.OriginalPublicationName: Systema Naturæ. Editio duodecima reformata. Tomus I [part 1]

Subspecies.Author: Whistler
Subspecies.OriginalPublicationName: Spolia Zeylanica
Subspecies.Distribution: NW Ghats from Surat Dangs but more regularly from NW Maharashtra till the southern tip of the peninsula in Kanyakumari district including the W coastal strip; In E India from, S W Bengal (Kolkata region), E Odisha (locally), along the E Ghats in Andhra, adjoining Telangana, and locally throughout S Karnataka and Tamil Nadu including parts of Deccan and E coastal plains.
Subspecies.Specimens: BNHS, ZSI, NHMUK, UMMZ, FMNH, YPM, TNHM, LKO

Genus.Name: Aethopyga
Genus.Author: Cabanis
Genus.OriginalPublicationName: Museum Heineanum. Verzeichniss der orithologischen Sammlung des Oberamtmann Ferdinand Heine
Genus.GenusDesignationPublicationName: , Catalogue of the genera and subgenera of birds contained in the British Museum

Subspecies.Author: Hodgson
Subspecies.OriginalPublicationName: The India Review and Journal of Foreign Science and the Arts
Subspecies.Distribution: E Himachal (one report from Kangra), Uttarakhand, N Bengal, Sikkim, Arunachal, Nagaland, Meghalaya, Cachar, and Manipur; straggles to lowland Assam.
Subspecies.Specimens: BNHS, NHMUK, UMMZ, AMNH, FMNH, ROM, USNM, YPM

Subspecies.Author: Baker
Subspecies.OriginalPublicationName: Bulletin of the British Ornithologists' Club
Subspecies.Distribution: Mizoram.

Subspecies.Author: Hodgson
Subspecies.OriginalPublicationName: The India Review and Journal of Foreign Science and the Arts
Subspecies.Distribution: Uttarakhand, N Bengal, Sikkim, and NW Assam that adjoins Bhutan.
Subspecies.Specimens: BNHS, UMZC, AMNH, FMNH, ROM, USNM, YPM

Subspecies.Author: Horsfield
Subspecies.OriginalPublicationName: Proceedings of the Zoological Society of London
Subspecies.Taxonomy: Includes _ariel_ Koelz 1953 from a place near Nokrek, Garo hills, W Meghalaya.
Subspecies.Distribution: Arunachal, C and E Assam, Nagaland, Meghalaya, Cachar, Manipur, and Mizoram.
Subspecies.Specimens: BNHS, ZSI, UMZC, UMMZ, FMNH, USNM, YPM

Subspecies.Author: Vigors
Subspecies.OriginalPublicationName: Proceedings of the Committee of Science and Correspondence of the Zoological Society of London
Subspecies.Distribution: Along the Himalaya from Jammu, through Himachal, Uttarakhand, N Bengal, Sikkim, Arunachal, and sporadically in adjoining Assam.
Subspecies.Specimens: BNHS, ZSI, NHMUK, UMMZ, AMNH, YPM

Subspecies.Author: Baker
Subspecies.OriginalPublicationName: Bulletin of the British Ornithologists' Club
Subspecies.Taxonomy: Includes _trochiloidea_ Koelz 1954 from Blue Mountain, Mizoram.
Subspecies.Distribution: Nagaland, Meghalaya, Cachar, Manipur, Mizoram, and Tripura – as well as adjoining Assam.
Subspecies.Specimens: NHMUK, UMMZ, AMNH, FMNH, USNM, YPM

Subspecies.Author: Verreaux
Subspecies.OriginalPublicationName: Revue et Magasin de Zoologie Pure et Appliquée
Subspecies.Distribution: Winter: Sporadic in Nagaland, Meghalaya, Manipur, and Mizoram.
Subspecies.Notes: Cachar report (AR2001) not evaluated but likely to be correct. See Islam _et al._ (2020).

Subspecies.Author: Blyth
Subspecies.OriginalPublicationName: Journal of the Asiatic Society of Bengal
Subspecies.Distribution: E Himachal and Uttarakhand.

Subspecies.Author: Hodgson
Subspecies.OriginalPublicationName: The India Review and Journal of Foreign Science and the Arts
Subspecies.Taxonomy: Includes _griseiceps_ Bentham 1908 from Darjeeling, N Bengal.
Subspecies.Distribution: N Bengal, Sikkim, W and C Arunachal, and adjoining Assam.
Subspecies.Specimens: BNHS, ZSI, UMMZ, AMNH, FMNH, MCZ, ROM, USNM, YPM
Subspecies.Notes: C Arunachal likely to be the zone of intergradation with _koelzi_.

Subspecies.Author: Ripley
Subspecies.OriginalPublicationName: Proceedings of the Biological Society of Washington
Subspecies.Taxonomy: Includes _ripleyi_ Koelz 1952 from Mawryngkneng, Khasi hills, Meghalaya.
Subspecies.Distribution: NW Arunachal from Mishmi hills onwards to Nagaland, Meghalaya, Cachar, and Manipur.
Subspecies.Specimens: BNHS, UMZC, UMMZ, FMNH, USNM, YPM

Subspecies.Author: Rippon
Subspecies.OriginalPublicationName: Bulletin of the British Ornithologists' Club
Subspecies.Distribution: Mizoram.

Species.Author: Sykes
Species.OriginalPublicationName: Proceedings of the Committee of Science and Correspondence of the Zoological Society of London
Species.Distribution: NW Ghats from Ratanmahal (Gujarat, further north of Narmada), Surat Dangs, south till about Goa and Dandeli. Sporadically in CW Ghats of Karnataka till about Kudremukh. Also, in the western edge of Satpura hills (Yawal).
Species.Specimens: BNHS, ZSI, NHMUK, AMNH, FMNH

Species.Author: Raffles
Species.OriginalPublicationName: Transactions of the Linnean Society of London

Subspecies.Author: Tickell
Subspecies.OriginalPublicationName: Journal of the Asiatic Society of Bengal
Subspecies.Taxonomy: Includes _mussooriensis_ Baker 1925 from Mussoorie, Uttarakhand.
Subspecies.Distribution: Himalayan foothills from Kashmir, Jammu, through Himachal, and Uttarakhand; adjoining Punjab, Haryana and N Uttar Pradesh, till N Bengal, and Sikkim. Disjunctly Chota Nagpur plateau in S W Bengal, S Jharkhand, NE Odisha, and south through NE Ghats of Odisha, adjoining Chhattisgarh, NE Andhra till Maredumilli (Andhra) on Godavari river; extending west till Balaghat and Kanha in E Madhya Pradesh.
Subspecies.Specimens: BNHS, ZSI, NHMUK, UMMZ, AMNH, FMNH, ROM, USNM, YPM

Subspecies.Author: Horsfield
Subspecies.OriginalPublicationName: Proceedings of the Zoological Society of London
Subspecies.Distribution: Assam, adjoining Arunachal, and all NE hill states.

Subspecies.Author: Hume
Subspecies.OriginalPublicationName: Stray Feathers
Subspecies.TypeLocality: (Kondul and Meroe Is, S Nicobar Is)
Subspecies.Distribution: S Nicobar group of islands.

Genus.Name: Arachnothera
Genus.Author: Temminck
Genus.OriginalPublicationName: Nouveau recueil de planches coloriées d'oiseaux, pour servir de suite et de complément aux planches enluminées de Buffon

Subspecies.Author: Latham
Subspecies.OriginalPublicationName: Index ornithologicus, sive systema ornithologiæ; complectens avium divisionem in classes, ordines, genera, species, ipsarumque varietates: adjectis synonymis, locis, descriptionibus, &c.
Subspecies.Taxonomy: Includes _vantynei_ Koelz 1939 from Jagalbet, near Londa, NW Karnataka.
Subspecies.Distribution: Occurs in three disjunct population (a) N Bengal, Sikkim, Arunachal, Assam, and all NE hill states, extending through Bangladesh till S W Bengal (b) NE Ghats of S Odisha, S Chhattisgarh, and NE Andhra (c) W Ghats from Ratnagiri (Maharashtra) more abundantly from about Goa south and all the way till the southern tip of the Ghats – extending marginally east through the Deccan transition zone in Karnataka as well as the outcrops of Nilgiris and Palanis (not in Biligirirangans).
Subspecies.Specimens: BNHS, ZSI, NHMUK, UMMZ, AMNH, FMNH, USNM, YPM, TNHM

Subspecies.Author: Hodgson
Subspecies.OriginalPublicationName: The India Review and Journal of Foreign Science and the Arts
Subspecies.Distribution: Bilaspur (Himachal, historical), N Bengal, Sikkim, Arunachal, Assam, and all NE hill states.
Subspecies.Specimens: BNHS, ZSI, NHMUK, UMMZ, AMNH, FMNH, ROM, USNM, YPM

Genus.Name: Irena
Genus.Author: Horsfield
Genus.OriginalPublicationName: Transactions of the Linnean Society of London

Subspecies.Author: Latham
Subspecies.OriginalPublicationName: Index ornithologicus, sive systema ornithologiæ; complectens avium divisionem in classes, ordines, genera, species, ipsarumque varietates: adjectis synonymis, locis, descriptionibus, &c.
Subspecies.Taxonomy: Includes here _sikkimensis_ Whistler & Kinnear 1933 (Type locality: Sukna, Darjeeling) of NE India; which is sometimes treated as a valid subspecies (see IOC).
Subspecies.Distribution: N Bengal, Sikkim, Arunachal, Assam, and all NE hill states; Straggler to Simlipal, Odisha (once). Disjunctly in CW Ghats from about Goa south till the southern tip in Kalakkad; also, in the Deccan transition zone and sporadically in W coastal plains; extends east to Biligirirangans and also, into SE Ghats, at least locally, including Talamalai, Melagiri, Kolli, Servarayan, Kalvarayan, and Chitteri (historical) hills.
Subspecies.Specimens: BNHS, ZSI, NHMUK, UMMZ, AMNH, FMNH, MCZ, ROM, USNM, YPM, TNHM

Subspecies.Author: Abdulali
Subspecies.OriginalPublicationName: Journal of the Bombay Natural History Society
Subspecies.Taxonomy: Not always recognised (RA2012).
Subspecies.Distribution: N, Middle, S, and Little Andaman Is. as well as the islets of Interview, Long, Havelock, Neil, Ross (Netaji), Tarmugli, and Rutland Is.

Genus.Name: Chloropsis
Genus.Author: Jardine & Selby
Genus.OriginalPublicationName: Illustrations of ornithology

Species.Author: Gray
Species.OriginalPublicationName: The zoological miscellany
Species.Taxonomy: Previously lumped with extralimital _C. cochinchinensis_.

Subspecies.Author: Walden
Subspecies.OriginalPublicationName: The Annals and Magazine of Natural History including Zoology, Botany, and Geology
Subspecies.Taxonomy: Includes _chloreus_ Koelz 1954 from Hahim Bazar, Assam.
Subspecies.Distribution: Brahmaputra plains of Assam and adjoining Arunachal, and all NE hill states.

Species.Author: Blyth
Species.OriginalPublicationName: Journal of the Asiatic Society of Bengal
Species.Taxonomy: ZSI#35394 listed as type in ZSI register but the collection year is 1847 and from Medinipur (W Bengal).
Species.Distribution: Entire peninsular India from E Gujarat, Madhya Pradesh, C Uttar Pradesh, Jharkhand, S W Bengal, all the way south till the southern tip including W Ghats, and E Ghats; locally in W and E coastal plains as well as Deccan.
Species.Specimens: BNHS, ZSI, NHMUK, UMMZ, AMNH, FMNH, YPM, TNHM, HYD

Subspecies.Author: Temminck
Subspecies.OriginalPublicationName: Nouveau recueil de planches coloriées d'oiseaux, pour servir de suite et de complément aux planches enluminées de Buffon
Subspecies.Distribution: E Himachal, N Haryana, Uttarakhand, N Uttar Pradesh, N Bengal, Sikkim, Arunachal, Assam, all NE hill states; a nearly disjunct population in EC India from C Madhya Pradesh, NE Maharashtra, Jharkhand, Chhattisgarh, S W Bengal, Odisha, and NE Andhra till about Godavari river.
Subspecies.Specimens: BNHS, ZSI, NHMUK, UMMZ, AMNH, FMNH, USNM, YPM, LKO

Subspecies.Author: Pelzeln
Subspecies.OriginalPublicationName: Sitzungsberichte der Kaiserlichen Akademie der Wissenschaften. Mathematisch-Naturwissenschaftliche Classe
Subspecies.Taxonomy: Includes _davidsoni_ Baker 1920, a new name for _malabaricus_ Gmelin 1788 from Malabar. See Baidya & Bhagat (2018) for resolution of the type locality; the type specimen apparently in Vienna Museum.
Subspecies.Distribution: W Ghats from Surat Dangs and sporadically in adjacent coastal plains as well as transition areas on the Deccan side, south till about Palakkad gap as well as SE and CE Ghats till about Godavari river.
Subspecies.Specimens: BNHS, ZSI, NHMUK, UMMZ, AMNH, FMNH, MCZ, USNM, YPM, MYS, LKO

Subspecies.Author: Whistler & Kinnear
Subspecies.OriginalPublicationName: Journal of the Bombay Natural History Society
Subspecies.Taxonomy: A poorly distinguished subspecies; not always recognised as SW Ghats birds are rather intermediate in size compared to true _insularis_ from Sri Lanka.
Subspecies.Distribution: SW Ghats roughly south of Palakkad gap.
Subspecies.Notes: Palakkad gap considered tentatively as the barrier between subspecies (Ali 1984) though the species is also present locally in Palakkad gap and their subspecific status is unknown.

Subspecies.Author: Jardine & Selby
Subspecies.OriginalPublicationName: Illustrations of ornithology
Subspecies.Distribution: E Himachal, Uttarakhand, N Bengal, Sikkim, Assam, Arunachal, and all NE hill states.
Subspecies.Specimens: BNHS, ZSI, NHMUK, UMMZ, FMNH, MCZ, ROM, USNM, YPM

Genus.Name: Ploceus
Genus.Author: Cuvier
Genus.OriginalPublicationName: Le règne animal distribué d'après son organisation, pour servir de base a l'histoire naturelle des animaux et d'introduction à l'anatomie comparée
Genus.GenusDesignationPublicationName: , A list of the genera of birds, with an indication of the typical species of each genus

Species.Author: Horsfield
Species.OriginalPublicationName: Transactions of the Linnean Society of London
Species.Taxonomy: Western _flaviceps_ intergrades with eastern _peguensis_ in W Bengal.

Subspecies.Author: Lesson
Subspecies.OriginalPublicationName: Traité d'Ornithologie, ou Tableau Méthodique des ordres, sous-ordres, familles, tribus, genres, sous-genres et races d'oiseaux
Subspecies.Distribution: Three nearly disjunct population (a) N India in the Indo-Gangetic plains from Jammu, through Punjab, Haryana, Delhi region, adjoining Himachal and Uttarakhand; N Rajasthan, Uttar Pradesh, Bihar, Jharkhand, and W Bengal (b) Kachchh (connected to Sindh population in Pakistan) and (c) S India from S Maharashtra south till Tamil Nadu and Kerala, extending through E coast of Andhra and Odisha till about W Bengal.

Subspecies.Author: Baker
Subspecies.OriginalPublicationName: Bulletin of the British Ornithologists' Club
Subspecies.Distribution: E Bihar, SW and N Bengal, as well as Brahmaputra plains of Assam and adjoining E Arunachal.

Subspecies.Author: Linnaeus
Subspecies.OriginalPublicationName: Systema Naturæ. Editio duodecima reformata. Tomus I [part 1]
Subspecies.Taxonomy: Includes here _baya_ Blyth 1844 from 'India' and _sardarpateli_ Koelz 1952 from Ratnapur, Bhavnagar, Saurashtra, Gujarat. Type locality recently restricted to Puducherry (Oschadleus 2018).
Subspecies.Distribution: Throughout India from Jammu south till Tamil Nadu, east till Bihar and W Bengal, and west till Rajasthan (excluding Thar) and Gujarat.
Subspecies.Specimens: BNHS, ZSI, NHMUK, UMMZ, FMNH, MCZ, ROM, USNM, YPM, HYD

Subspecies.Author: Ali & Whistler
Subspecies.OriginalPublicationName: Journal of the Bombay Natural History Society
Subspecies.Distribution: SW coast from about Goa through coastal Karnataka and Kerala.

Subspecies.Author: Ticehurst
Subspecies.OriginalPublicationName: Bulletin of the British Ornithologists' Club
Subspecies.Taxonomy: Intergrades with the nominate subspecies in W Bengal.
Subspecies.Distribution: E India from E Bihar, W Bengal, and the Brahmaputra plains of Assam and adjoining E Arunachal as well as the lowland regions of all NE hill states.
Subspecies.Specimens: BNHS, ZSI, NHMUK, UMMZ, FMNH, YPM

Subspecies.Author: Hume
Subspecies.OriginalPublicationName: Ibis
Subspecies.Taxonomy: Includes here _rutledgii_ Finn 1899 from Nainital, Uttarakhand.
Subspecies.Distribution: Historically, the Terai region of Uttarakhand and N Uttar Pradesh; now restricted to Rampur and Bijnor districts in N Uttar Pradesh and Udham Singh Nagar district of S Uttarakhand.
Subspecies.Notes: See Bharghava (2017).

Subspecies.Author: Abdulali
Subspecies.OriginalPublicationName: Journal of the Bombay Natural History Society
Subspecies.Distribution: Terai of N Bengal (historical) and C Assam plains.
Subspecies.Notes: Historical reports from Kolkata could be escaped individuals (see Bhargava 2017).

Species.Author: Linnaeus
Species.AlternativeNames: Bengal Weaver, Black-throated Weaver, Black-throated Weaver Bird
Species.OriginalPublicationName: Systema Naturæ per Regna Tria Naturæ, Secundum Classes, Ordines, Genera, Species, cum Characteribus, Differentiis, Synonymis, Locis. Tomus I. Editio decima, reformata
Species.Taxonomy: Two forms, black-faced and white-faced, have been argued to be two subspecies (see Pittie _et al._ 1999, Unnithan 2001, Menon _et al._ 2022).
Species.Distribution: Through Indian subcontinent from Jammu S through all states in the Indo-Gangetic and Brahmaputra plains, E Rajasthan, Gujarat, Madhya Pradesh, NW Maharashtra; on the E peninsula from Odisha, Chhattisgarh, Telangana, Andhra, extending to N Karnataka; sporadically in Manipur valley; recently further S in Chennai and Bengaluru region and expanding further south to Coimbatore and Madurai.
Species.Specimens: BNHS, ZSI, NHMUK, UMMZ, AMNH, FMNH, USNM, YPM, LKO

Genus.Name: Euodice

Genus.OriginalPublicationName: Die Singvögel als Fortsetzung der vollständingsten Naturgeschichte und zugleich als Central-Atlas für zoologische Garten und für Thierfreunde
Genus.GenusDesignationPublicationName: , Catalogue of the birds in the British Museum

Species.Author: Linnaeus
Species.OriginalPublicationName: Systema Naturæ per Regna Tria Naturæ, Secundum Classes, Ordines, Genera, Species, cum Characteribus, Differentiis, Synonymis, Locis. Tomus I. Editio decima, reformata
Species.Distribution: Throughout the Indian subcontinent from Jammu south till southern tip of peninsula and east till W Bengal and Tripura; sporadic in W coast and coastal Odisha; has occurred in N Bengal and W Meghalaya (Garo hills).
Species.Specimens: BNHS, ZSI, NHMUK, UMMZ, AMNH, FMNH, YPM, TNHM, HYD

Genus.Name: Lonchura
Genus.Author: Sykes
Genus.OriginalPublicationName: Proceedings of the Committee of Science and Correspondence of the Zoological Society of London
Genus.GenusDesignationPublicationName: , Catalogue of the birds in the British Museum

Subspecies.Author: Linnaeus
Subspecies.OriginalPublicationName: Systema Naturæ per Regna Tria Naturæ, Secundum Classes, Ordines, Genera, Species, cum Characteribus, Differentiis, Synonymis, Locis. Tomus I. Editio decima, reformata
Subspecies.Distribution: Throughout Indian subcontinent from Kashmir, Jammu, till southern tip of the peninsula in Tamil Nadu, west till Gujarat, and east till W Bengal.
Subspecies.Specimens: BNHS, ZSI, NHMUK, UMMZ, AMNH, FMNH, MCZ, ROM, USNM, YPM, TNHM, HYD

Subspecies.Author: Godwin-Austen
Subspecies.OriginalPublicationName: Proceedings of the Zoological Society of London
Subspecies.Taxonomy: Includes here _catervaria_ Koelz 1954 from Mawphlang, Khasi hills, Meghalaya.
Subspecies.Distribution: Assam, Arunachal, and all NE hill states.
Subspecies.Specimens: BNHS, NHMUK, UMMZ, AMNH, FMNH, ROM, YPM
Subspecies.Notes: Exact region of intergradation with the nominate subspecies not worked out but somewhere in N Bengal or W Assam.

Species.Author: Jerdon
Species.OriginalPublicationName: The birds of India; being a natural history of all the birds known to inhabit continental India: with descriptions of the species, genera, families, tribes, and orders, and a brief notice of such families as are not found in India, making it a manual of ornithology specially adapted for India

Subspecies.Author: Whistler & Kinnear
